description: An amazing kinetic light sculpture experience in a space that feels like coming )^(ome!  Play with the giant LiteBrite, chill to dreamy music and laser light sculptures, and ride the pink Magic Bunny art car - need we say more?

name: Home Free Dome
description: Home Free Dome is a community of encounter, designed to amplify the transformative cultural forces at play in Black Rock City. We turn spectators into participants, virgins into veterans, and veterans into virtuosos.

name: Home Rule
description:
Now in our fifth year on playa, Home Rule Village is committed to engaging BRC denizens in novel forms of expression, exploration, relaxation and connection.

Seven unique camps combine to offer a wildly diverse experience, including an array of workshops, seminars, dance parties, vaudeville shows, improve comedy classes, holistic healing, diversity-awareness events, yoga practice, body painting classes, blind taste-testing dinners, fire spinning and more!

name: HomeSlice
description: Drop in for a cheerful "Slice of Home"—Playa-style.  Participate in our comfort-food cook-offs, climb the sky-high HomeSlice Tower's inverted pyramids, or re-engineer your Playa duds and gear at our Radical Alteration clinics.

name: Home Sweet Dome
description:
Home Sweet Dome is a public chill space at the heart of Hushville, nest to the Town Round.
We offer shade in the daytime, lighted area at night, solar powered battery charging, bike repair, various activities by Hushville residents, and general merriment.

name: Homojitoville
description: Amidst the dust and in from the blind, A caravan begins to arrive. Their color is FULL, and their energy BRIGHT! Thank heavens it’s the Homos coming into sight! They bring with them drink, the most refreshing to be found; A Homojito they call it, better than ANY around! Its succulent tartness with fresh pulled mint, you’re sure to enjoy each and every sip. Come with us and clown! We’ll be all around town! You'll see the fur coming while sweet music abounds!

name: Honeysuckle Hood
description: Honeysuckle Hood is a conscious village comprised of three interactive, playful and engaging theme camps: Heart Tribe, Camp Mystic and Chakralicious Camp. Together these camps form a trinity of sacred connection and exploration of the Heart through the elements of body, mind and spirit. Heart Tribe's element is the body, Camp Mystic’s is the mind and Chakralicious Camp’s is the spirit. As a village, we offer a diversity of highly interactive and educational workshops,gatherings, dance parties, art exhibits, healing sessions, performances and speakers.

name: Hooker Support Camp
description: Support camp for a webby playground of epic proportion - crocheted with love from rope - creating a place to dream, play and open yourself up to possibilities.

name: Hooville Hummuside
description: Honey! Those kids from Oregon showed up again and they keep trying to give me hookahs and hummus! Pedal by Hooville Hummuside for hookah sessions throughout the day or make a point to come at sunset to snack on some hummus and pita on your way back to your camp before the sun goes down!

name: Hope
description: Camp hope offers espresso, love, and messages of hope to be shared later on with the community. Come join our family!

name: Horny Camp
description:
Horny People, release your inner devil, daemon, or unicorn and come make horns with us! We supply the clay, instructions, and gas fired oven. You supply your inner creativity and vision. Lounge in our shade structure while your masterpiece bakes (15 min) and when it's done, we'll help you fit them to your head, chest, nipples, or whatever body part you choose to adorn. 

Classes take place 12-ish to 4-ish depending on how hung-over WE are or how horny YOU are. REMEMBER: Classes only run from MON.-THU. so come while supplies last!

Monday, August 25th, 2014 noon – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 26th, 2014 noon – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 27th, 2014 noon – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 28th, 2014 noon – 4 p.m. 


Do you like it hot? Really, REALLY hot? Show us how much heat you can handle and join us for our Hot & Horny bar night, offering 3 types of spicy vodka and beer mixers on Tuesday from sundown to 10PM or when the booze runs out.

name: HOTD - Hair of the Dog
description: Your friendly neighborhood bar and live music venue.  HOTD stage features Open Mic, variety acts, and all types of music daily and nightly.  You bring the drinks and music....we'll supply the drinks and music!

name: Houphoria
description: Experience Houphoria...the natural extension of big Texas ideas and open arms southern hospitality meets classy dance lounge.The Houston CORE team has broadened our scope and is now Creating Opportunities for Radical Entertainment as well as reinvigorating some old good habits from DFT days...like serving Texas Beer and loving the Pillowasis--Now with Breakfast in Bed! And Pillow Talk! You'll find us by the light of The Cubes and as always, under the Lone Star Flag. Come say Howdy!

name: House of Sammich
description: The House Of Sammich is home to The Great Sammich Ride art car, comfy lounging and gluten free gourmet toasted peanut butter and jelly sammiches, complete with cinnamon butter. And hangtime sammich storytelling evenings around an art burn barrel.

name: HOVerlandia
description: HOVerlandia is a reserved camp for participants riding the Burner Express.  Fast friends made on the journey to Black Rock City can camp together!  This space is filled with people from all over the world - come by and say hello!

name: HOVerlandia - Burner Express Camp
description: Swing by HOVerlandia and meet participants who traveled to Black Rock City onboard the Burner Express. They will tell you all about their great adventure from all over the world to the desert.

name: Huggzilla
description: Playa recharging station through hugs and music!

name: HUMANO
description: HUMANO - A Mexican cultural experience.  Visit us and learn about Mexican philosophy, people, art, sound, and vibe.

name: Hushville
description: Hushville, an aural oasis in an undulating sea of chaos, is open to any camper who pre-registers and can abide our three simple rules: 1) No Generators; 2) No Amplified Sound; and 3) Leave No Trace. Because Hushville is a village in Black Rock City, we can't promise that it will be quiet... just quieter.

name: HYBYCOZO
description: The Hyperspace Bypass Construction Zone or HYBYCOZO in partnership with The Construction Zone Neighborhood Association invites all to come and see the plans on display to build HYBYCOZO -Deep Thought, including scale model lights, 3D prototypes, light up maquettes, and other geometric polyhedrons. Come experience the wonders of geometry and mathematical pattern making while sipping on some intergalactic chai.

name: Hyperbole
description: Hyperbole is a camp for dreamers, artists, builders, makers, druids, reptaliens, time travelers, cynics and jokers. Come experience life with us.

name: Ibiza Camp
description: Ibiza camp, a replica of a bedouin camp at black rock city.

name: Ice Cubed
description: Ice Cubed is the ice sales igloo located in the 3 o'clock plaza.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3/bag.  Ice3 sales hours are Mon-Sat, 9am-6pm and Sun Noon-6pm. (No pre-event or Labor Day sales at this location).

name: Ice Nine
description: Ice Nine is the ice sales igloo located in the 9 o'clock plaza.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3/bag .  Ice9 sales hours are Mon-Sat, 9am-6pm and Sun Noon-6pm.  (No pre-event or Labor Day sales at this location).

name: Ice Sauna
description: None

name: Icy Hands CHILLZONE
description: Chill out with the Icy Hands crew as they defrost between midday mercy missions: share cool stories, images and video of those touched by icy hands under the sizzling playa sun.  Learn how to turn a simple block of ice into smiles, goosebumps and a truly incredible shared experience!

name: IDEATE
description: None

name: Ignited States Ski Patrol
description: Ignited States Ski Patrol welcomes all Black Rock City Suckers.... er, Citizens... to come on by!  Try your luck at the Ski Patrol Fun n Games Center, relax with us on our Front Porch, or stop by for a drink at the Ignite Your States Ski Lodge!

name: Iguana Chill Camp
description: Iguana Chill Camp is a small camp of friends. The camp boasts a nice shade and an inviting wigwam chill space open to all, pleasantly outfitted with curtains and pillows, music and lights, hookahs and cold drinks, musical instruments and drums. Our goal is to radiating our groovy chill vibes by offering professional massage, tarot readings, ecstatic dance, yoga classes, sing alongs, and cooling sprays with essential oils.

name: Illumelodie, Home of Lazerdome
description:
Camp Illumelodie is now at home in Spanky's Wine Bar!  

Lazerdome is the amazing laser and lighting entertainment dome that's now a part of Spanky's. 

Eros Tangere, the one-on-one erotic tactile performance experience for adults 

and 

Dare to Bare airbrush and body painting! 

Look us up and check out our events and activities. Located inside Spanky's Wine Bar.

name: Illumination Village
description: "A Drinking Village with a Fire Problem:" Illumination Village is one of BRC's oldest villages, bringing classic fire art to the esplanade, and total mayhem to the people of Burning Man!

name: Illuminaughty
description: Welcome to Camp Illuminaughty! Come by at dusk for our music and light-filled activities, then follow us and the Wall of Light out into the night to dance ‘til dawn!

name: ILLUMINUS
description:
Come rock like an Egyptian in our art-gallery-being, sex-swing-having, two-story illuminated pyramid! Enjoy a tasty beverage at our Cool Cat Café in the daytime, or a crystal-infused Chakra Shot at night!

Check our whiteboard for daily workshops!

name: IMAGINEnation
description:
IMAGINEnation is a life coaching camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty.

Our coaches provide daily life coaching workshops and one-on-one coaching to the people of the playa.

name: Inappropirates
description:
The inappropirates are... 1) Inappropriate. 2) Pirates.

Oh. And we serve coffee.

name: IN DUST WE TRUST
description: Come by, enjoy the chill space, choose some sexy lingerie for your playa night pleasure, exchange stories, join in the organized chaos.

name: I NEED AN ADULT VILLAGE
description: None

name: Infinite Community
description: The Infinite Community Artist Support Camp supports the Los Angeles Midway project.

name: Infinity
description:
Welcome to Infinity!

Lounge in our shaded CuddleOasis or in our Hammock Wheel, get your nails painted and your infinite vibe on with our Beautification Station, get energy and body work in our Brainwashing Station, or participate in MAD SCIENCE:  it's all here!

You are invited to our annual 50's Housewife Party, Wednesday 1-4pm.

name: Inflatable Wildlife Conservatory
description: Join our Oasis! Relax in the flamingo lagoon. Tour our exotic collection of wildlife while sipping on cocktails in real coconuts. Camp inflatables will give you a relaxing experience and bring the Jungle to you. Mingle, Lounge and Dance by our Bar to the harmonious Tiki inspired Electro swing tunes.

name: Inspiration Moasis
description: We encourage all citizens of Black Rock City to be themselves through mutual validation through open communication, collaboration, and unity. Come get inspired by and with seasoned burners in a mediterranean-style chillout space.

name: #instafameOASIS
description: #instafameoasis

name: Intense Intents In Tents
description: A collection of intentional communities bring the spirit of artist expression, radical collaboration, and collective hospitality to the playa!

name: Intergalactic Sasquatch
description: Like the Cantina from Star Wars, but a lot less cutty and a lot more lovee.

name: Iron Monkey's - Well of Darkness
description: Home of the Iron Monkeys

name: Iron Rose
description: When you're tired of the techno, find us.

name: Irrelephant Bird Camp
description: From the dust and destruction of Elephant Bird Camp, comes Irrelephant Bird Camp, Grahama’s last dying wish, which was for Elephant Bird Camp to return to the playa and with it bringing dorkier, sillier, funkier, messier, and even more friendly-er people and events, but with more Irr than ever before, which everyone likes because people can’t get enough Irr in their life, as we all know, so that is why we are the best but also the most modest there ever was and that is grand, which also explains how we are gods among men/women/small flightless birdies, the tiniest, sweetest, tastiest, look-but-don’t touch-fishies, for which there is no replacement, no better leader, no better warrior, no better crocheter of crotchless panties than you.

name: It's All Made Up
description:
It's All Made Up (IAMU) has a reputation for manifesting some of BRC's most interesting events and gatherings, including dance parties, yoga classes, body painting, group meditation, spiritual exercises, large theme dinners, fire dancing demonstrations and more.

There will be improv comedy classes, a burlesque show, snow cone gifts, a mega Sunday morning pancake breakfast, a BRC farmer's market, self-awareness and spiritual development workshops with themes ranging from "Black on the Playa" to group forgiveness circles, and throughout it all, down-tempo boogie or deep house playlists will radiate through the air and prompt smiles and hugs all around.

name: Janky Barge
description: Come join us on a ride-a-long for some music and fun with the Janky Barge or hangout with us at our bar & lounge!

name: Jankytown
description: Live music, circus art, comedy, and performance art featuring artists from Cirque du Cliche, Samba Stilt Circus, Fou Fou Ha Clowns, and Ministry of Flow Fire Arts

name: Jellyfish 12000
description:
The Jellyfish 12000 invites you to come explore the aquatic alien underground native to ancient Lake Lahotan. Our otherworldly time-traveling family of mutant vessels consists of The Amazing Jellyfish From The Year 12000 and Jelly Roll.

jellyfish 12000 say
human be nice to other human
human protect nice planet
human go on get funky

name: Jerk Church
description: We gather at our cathedral to Break Bread, Share a Cup, and a Song. Sometimes we have weddings. Sometimes we run a bar. Sometimes we like to sit quietly and contemplate the true nature of the Jerk. All are welcome.

name: JOBI: Coffee, Tea or Me?
description: Good morning Black Rock City!  7 a.m. sunrise service of coffee, tea, hot chocolate (and "Me" if you ask nicely).  Coffee if you're getting up, tea if you played through, hot chocolate if you're feeling snuggly.  Sofas, pillows, rugs arranged under the big wooden structure arrayed with sparkly and flowing stuff.  Firepit if it's cold.  Stop by -- but always bring your own cup.

name: Jub Jub's Plastic Circus
description: Welcome! The Monkey's back in the Carnival & will proudly serve funny hard-to-get drinks, uneasy rest, strange music, weird plays, loud noises, oh-so-friendly grief, bruises, nausea, vertigo i.e. Monkey Business!!!   maybe poo too…

name: Kaleidoscope Collective
description: Kaleidoscope means "the observation of beautiful forms", but we know you look into a kaleidoscope and see a beautiful mess. That's just what we are. We bring people together through the power of stories and art (and monkey bars). Kaleidoscope Collective.  Share a story, spin a yarn, tell a tale.  We're all ears.

name: Kamp BrewHaHa
description: Kamp BrewHaha - from 7-11 each morning we provide freshly brewed coffee, banter, good humor and even better people; old school coffee house of the first order, out in the peaceful suburbs of BRC.

name: Kampersia
description: Kampersia melds traditional persian culture with modern burner ideas. Like tea and middle eastern food? We got you covered. How about traditional rose tobacco hookah and live acoustic music? Us too. We love persian culture, but we'd really love it if we could share it with you!

name: Kamp Kaos
description: Kaos brings a human-scale fabric art maze, hall of mirrors, and late night Death Marches back to the playa!

name: Kamp Kimono
description: Spontaneous desert haiku and mail art... Love! Kimonos! Weirdness!

name: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye
description: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye, home of the Official Black Rock City Garnish fire and circus arts, Toolsday and The Suck 'N Fuck Saloon!

name: Kanuckistan BLASTO
description: Laser blaster shooting range features a quadcopter drone and a blazing ball of fire. 100% eyesafe. Home of the Old Country Vodka Snorting Bar, 11th annual Xeni Cup street hockey game.

name: KashyyyK
description:
Wookie Juice, Wookie Hugs, Wookie Art & Wookies dancing like... 
Well... like Wookies.

name: KavAquatic
description:
Come and enjoy a relaxing sunset time with us to share our aquatic kava tasting experience! Replenish yourself before the night takes on.

KavAquatic will be serving kava from late afternoon to the first hours of the night as is traditionally done in the Pacific Islands of Vanuatu, New-Caledonia and Fiji, in a setting taking you right back to an island paradise!

name: Kazbah
description: The Kazbah is a Sound Camp based in San Francisco.  We are dedicated to spreading positive vibes and world-class house music.

name: KazbusKamp Transformation Station
description: Kazbus Kamp Transformation Station! Let us work some mirror magic! Come to our big top for a three-ring circus of top-to-bottom transformation and a new you: Saturnalia Salon for face and body painting and hair mutation; Atelier of the Absurd for carny costumery and outrageous accessorizing; and Psychic Parlour for some affirmative encouragement to discover your playa gifts. Let our talented team of image alchemists tease out the beautiful, bodacious Burner in you!

name: Kegel Kamp and Bijou Boutique
description: Exercise your PCs!  Can you peg the Kegel-O-Meter?  Play Kegel Pong!  Compete for valuable bragging rights or pick up a piece of jewelry at the Boutique!

name: Kegel Kommandos
description: None

name: Kentucky Fried Camp
description: Kentucky Fried Camp - proudly serving the finest breakfast on the playa with the sweetest southern hospitality since 2000 something. Fried Baloney Sandwiches and fine Kentucky bourbon served up daily by gingham clad Kentuckians.

name: Khan's Asylum
description: Welcome... to Khan's Asylum! Drink cool refreshing Romulan ale, make your own tribble, and show off your acting skills  at our "Shat-off" as we recreate famous movie scenes in the style of William Shatner!

name: Kidsville
description: Kidsville is THE place for kids and their families! We host a group of diverse families creating a unique space for play and other activities including the Black Rock Scouts program. Families with children 0-17 years of age are welcome to camp with us if they are pre-registered. Registration begins in March and ends when full. Note: Kidsville is NOT a baby-sitting service. All children must be supervised by an adult.

name: Kindergarten Kamp
description: Kindergarten Kamp is bringing it's playground out for your enjoyment - kids of all ages (families, friends and all playa peeps) are welcome to enjoy our swings, trampoline, and teeter-totter, mini teeter totter, tree fort, sandless sandbox with toys, a one-hole miniature golf course, self-portrait tent, and carnival art adorning the camp - Kindergarten style!  In the Gnome dome, hookah time and Swag poker will happen two nights - bring lots of swag!  You will also be able to relax in our carnival styled Monkey-Hut complex.

name: Kind of a Big Dill
description: Kind of a Big Dill: “Bar + Attractions and Amusements!” is a BRC version of the “roadside attraction.” We aim to provide fuel, refreshment, rest, social pause, and an assortment of curiosities to engage Burners traveling between the city and the open Playa.

name: Kin-Dza-Dza!
description: Camp Kin-Dza-Dza!, bringing Soviet dystopia and tea to the Playa since 2006!

name: Kissing Dinos
description: None

name: Kosmik Dust Pedal Pub Theme Camp
description: Look for the Star Tunnel for iced tea, lemonade and cookies or play in our motion activated sound garden.  Chill in the shade of our Kosmik Kafe or pedal with us across the playa under the cool canopy of the Pedal pub, our pedal powered bike bar.

name: Kostume Kult
description:
Kostume Kult presents: UNDERGROUND NYC
From under the dusty pavement, the ultimate NYC Carnival Emerges... Urban Legends rise from the kkatacombs, dark figures lurk, steam pulses, things slither and growl. At Burning Man 2015 Kostume Kult's ongoing FreaKKshow is emerging from the sub-urban depths… Strutting down our runway onto Esplanade Frontage!

name: Kreme Burners
description: Rave de Creme Brulees: Enjoy some cool beats in the afternoon, turning into Dubstep as the evening comes, while tasting the finest French style Creme Brulees on the playa. Show us your best tricks on the trampoline, get a cocktail refill when the bar is open, or just come and chill with us in the dodecagon.

name: KSA Disco Katz
description: Pounce by for a furrocious pawty in our gLitter box disco pyramid, enjoy a meowmosa to some funky house on Monday morning, or perhaps bring your finest hat for Hatty Hour on Wednesday shortly before dusk, but for the Madonna fans out there who happen to have a soft spot for house and daquiri's we have just the thing: MaDaquiri Hour on Friday late afternoon will tie together your life! Purr... HISS HISS!!! Purrr......

name: La Calaca Village
description: Come visit La Calaca Village who is proud to present Pinata's Plaza and La Calaca Healing Dome Plaza!  Come enjoy spiritual healing, yoga and related arts during the day and party at the Pinatas Present Sunset and Sangria events every evening from 6-8.

name: LAFer Camp
description: None

name: Lahontan Korps
description: Visit Lahontan Korps. A shade structure for guests. Hydration Station for those in need of bottled water.

name: Lamplighter Village
description: http://burningman.org/event/volunteering/teams/lamplighters/

name: Larry will Name it/First Camp
description: Larry Harvey will write this

name: Last Flamethrower
description: Last Flamethrower Art Support Camp. http://matisse.net/flamethrower/

name: Last Pig's Hideout
description: Last Pig's Hideout: We're a lovely group of gadflies who... I Camp Remember!

name: Last Resort Country Club (LRC)
description: At the darkest edge of the Outer Ring, The Last Resort Camp is a vision to weary adventurers brave enough to explore Black Rock City’s limits and newcomers approaching its distant lights. An oasis of comfort and civilization before the barren wilds open up behind us, The Last Resort is a place you can have a seat in the shade, sip a mai thai, take some tennis lessons and make some friends before you rocket away across the dust.

name: Lavender Lounge
description: The Lavender Lounge has been on the Playa for over 10 years providing a mid day chill space. This is a family friendly treatment with lavender oil-water mist and head message.

name: Lazy Skool Daze
description: Lazy Skool Daze is an intellectual and artistic haven for the sharing of knowledge, love, and adventure. We present a creative, welcoming space where playa-mavens can come to teach and learn, to perform and observe, to show and tell.

name: LED Dinosaur
description: LED Dinosaur is Burning Man's best preparty destination.  Come by to grab some glowsticks & drinks while you paint our giant dinosaurs and dance to some house beats.

name: Le Kafé
description:
Warm.  Loving.  Sexy.  Coffee.  Home.  Le Kafé may be the coziest landing spot on playa at any hour.  
Morning: delicious servers in French maid regalia.  Organic coffee and tea with pastries and biscotti in our front of house Kafe.  Watch for our mobile unit bringing hot java to the sunrise Robot Heart shows!
Afternoon: shady napping in our “flounge” (lounge of many futons).  Cool off in our new swamp-cooled yurt; enjoy our large hammock or porch swing.  Down tempo grooves day and night.    Relax.  Sip a cold one.  Soak your feet in a cool medicinal bath.  
Evening: informal cocktail lounge; play with our many lighted toys.  Our late night fire pit warms your bones into the wee hours. Share a ceremonial pipe ritual while; trade stories and flirtations.  Don't leave! Blankets and pillows emerge in the lounge. Snuggle. Slumber.  Repeat.
Check out our container top sky bedroom, step into the speakeasy for adult fun.  Come see why we continue to be a favorite cozy spot in Black Rock City.

name: Leopard Martini Lounge
description: None

name: LET GO MY EGO & FLOW
description: Illuminating The World : Through Inspiring Ourselves & Each Other. Expanding Our Ability To Thrive & Accomplish Bold Feats Of Daring, While Inspiring Frivolity, Illuminating Ideas & Deep Connections.

name: Let It Go
description: At “Let it Go” we would like to provide a space where people can feel comfortable to let go regardless of their cultural background or spiritual beliefs.  Come to our confession booth and let go of that which does not serve you.  We offer a variety of yoga, meditation, dance, reiki, arts & crafts, and poi classes.  Need a place to reconnect with the infinite?  Come visit our meditation dome.

name: Life Cube Burning Man 2015
description: Life Cube Burning Man 2015 is a passionate group of Cube-ists that have come together to create magic on the playa.  Visit the Life Cube art installation - write down goals, dreams, wishes, and aspirations on wish-sticks, watch murals be painted during the week, express yourself, share your hopes and dreams.  Check out the tapestry wall of 1000s of panels from burners all around the world.  Climb and play.  Have fun and watch as we all birth creativity. And we will be burning on Friday night.

name: Life Rulez
description: The life "ruleS" at Life Rulez is that life rulezzz!

name: LightSweeper
description: Star in your own 80s-style arcade game! Step into our console and onto the light-up dance floor where you can play fun games like giant Minesweeper! Experience life-size, 8-bit immersion!

name: Liminal Labs
description: Do mornings on the playa find you a little dazed and hazy? Do you wish there were some middle-of-the-night place where you could grab a seat and let your mind be doubly warped? Liminal Labs have you covered! From 10-noon each morning, we happily throw open the Liminal Pharmakon where you are invited to choose from an apothecary menu full of salubrious nostrums, elixirs and vitamin-rich restoratives. After dark, all night long, Tuesday through Saturday, we invite you to Mirror Movie Mashup, where daring cinephiles grab a seat and watch TWO movies at once! Think of it, BARBARELLA & LOGAN’S RUN! THE HUNGER & ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE! DUMBO & CAROUSEL! REPO MAN & PULP FICTION! ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK & THE WARRIORS! STAR WARS & STAR TREK! Or talk us into showing your own mirrored movie picks from our extensive roster of fine films, tv shows and ridiculous youtube videos. All this and free popcorn, too!

name: Lip Bomb
description: Lip Bomb is about the celebration of celebration in all of its naughty light heartedness. We do this through a chill environment of deep house, Down tempo, chill and fun lounge house music. Our camp is open daily for our coffee and tea social and our bar is open nightly for our signature drink The cherry Lip Bomb.

name: Lip Service
description:
LIP SERVICE - Bad Advice, Free!
Life not working?  Come to LIP SERVICE where we believe no problem is so big it can't be run away from, and blame is the first step towards healing.

name: Listen
description: Come to Listen and be heard.

name: Little Uncle Janis' Pizza Planet
description: At the pizza planet, all of our nieces and nephews are welcome with open arms and love in our hearts. Come and grab a button but do not upset sleeping Little Uncle Janis, he gets cranky.

name: Lituanica Birds
description:
Nestworking Lithuanian style

Each year dozens of Lithuanian burners together as a flock of birds migrate over Atlantic to the Playa where they setup their temporary nest - Lituanica Birds camp.
In 2015 Lithuanians we plan to have a huge and interactive Nest so we invite all burners for NESTWORKING at our camp.

name: L melon O P
description: A totally serious, highly organized, completely childish camp of melon-lovers.

name: LMP likemindedpeople CAMP
description:
A space to experience, explore and express with acceptance.
Daily didgeridoo soundscape and DJ performances with the conscious community in mind. Chill, safe sacred space within a TIPI available 24/7 to reflect, release or meditate. Didgeridoo lessons and more!

name: Local Kooling
description: Local Kooling, inside Martini Village, is a place to stop by to share a cool drink and time with cool new friends.

name: Lola
description: At Camp LOLA our philosophy is spontaneity and serendipity. Bring us something from your heart - a poem, a dance, a song, etc. and express it on our "soap box" or draw a square for our Living with Heart tapestry. We offer healing touch instruction for couples, children's book story and cuddle time with optional vibrator, daily meditation, amateur yoga and coffee or flaming enemas for deserving pilgrims.

name: Loquacious and Lovely
description: Loquacious and Lovely Art camp hosted by PO9

name: Lost & Found
description: )'( Together We Can Do Anything )'(

name: Lost in Space Tribe
description: Bringing the Sixties to the playa ... from the people who were there!  Who doesn't love the music of the Sixties and where else on the playa can you find it ... come enjoy a Summer of Love experience!

name: Love Beets
description: Your Chief Love Vibrators on the Playa

name: Love Bubble
description: Love Bubble - Come into our Love Bubble where you can feast your body temple, nourish your psyche, and feed your soul.

name: Love It!
description: None

name: Love Land
description: Love Land: We welcome and inspire people taking part in the Burning Man Experience. Featuring daily activities,  the 4th annual "Steely Dan Happy Hour", the 2nd annual"David Bowie Happy Hour" and our 5th or 6th Annual Pastie Workshop: bling out your boobs in our cozy beehive dome! Get crafty and create your own sexy pasties, adorn yourself with body paint, enjoy a cocktail, or shake your booty to our honey-licious Dj's + More!

name: Love Potion
description:
Celebrating art, creativity, whimsy, fun, family, positive vibes , 'Luurve’ & our famous Love Potion. 
To learn more, go to http://www.lovepotioncollective.org

name: Love Puddle
description: A bar, playground and lounge open every afternoon that serves the most refreshing punch on the playa, to enjoy before or after playing foursquare or swinging on the swings. Ask nicely and we might give you a Love Puddle or whip out Dildo Jousting. We also have a small stage for intimate performances that is open for your scheduled or impromptu shows.

name: Lucy B
description: Aldo at Camp Lucy B! Come say hello to your favorite Suave Ride and check out the Little House of Hoarders. Bet we have something you need...

name: Ludus Symposium
description: Come by our spot on the playa for a beer and a great view of the playa off our deck!

name: Lunar Disco
description: Lunacy with a Pinch of Disco.  Follow the sound, follow the moon.

name: Luxurious Vagrants
description: Luxurious Vagrants is where sandy bodies come to get fancy! Enter our parlor to try on tattoos, bedazzle your bodies, and leave feeling special.

name: MacGyvers' Union
description: Every camp has a MacGyver -- now the MacGyvers have a union. We provide all MacGyvers with recognition, thanks, tools, training, entertainment, emotional and moral support, chill space away from their home camp, and an official ID card.

name: Magic Pancakes Project
description: The Bizarre Necessities: Magic Pancake Project, will be serving pancakes dyed with different fruit juices, with a vegan/gluten free option Monday thru Saturday at 10 am! There will be a 80's themed prom night on Tuesday and    Bunny/Carrot March after party on Thursday, along with various healing sessions, tarot card reading, meditation, and more!

name: Mamasaurus
description: A technicolor land before time, featuring an interactive Mamasaurus sculpture, a jurassic chill area, and beats.

name: Mama's Whore's and S'mores
description: None

name: Mangueira
description: We are the first Brazilians to bring art to the Playa, with a support camp for artists and friends! Come stay with us! We will provide a Shower area, Kitchen Area, Dj Booth, Dancing Area, Bar, Camping area, Lounge / Chillout area, Dinning area!! Come along!

name: Mansonian Institute
description: Mansonian Institute of Urban Studies - Burning Man historical and educational society providing artist support services for large art projects on playa. Come on by and learn some interesting facts about Burning Man history and the art projects, both past and present.

name: Martini Village
description: Come visit Martini Village and enjoy cold refreshments, entertainment and much more!!!  Look us up for our scheduled events or just stop by and check out a random happy hour.  Be prepared to be immersed in the 10 principles of the playa.

name: M*A*S*H 4207th
description: We’re not Doctors. The least disciplined military unit on the playa. Random security Checkpoints will occur. Terrorists & Loyal Citizens will be labeled. Propaganda & commentary provided for the prevention of communism. Nightly viewings of old episodes & movies from the show. Since 1999, your bastion of Democracy in a sea of fifth column communist/socialist/lawless infiltrators and barbarian mutants! Daytime martinis at Rosie’s Bar. Praise the lord and pass the sauce!

name: Math Camp @ Group W
description: Math Camp @ Group W is A Safe Place for Mathematics: A small, social camp, offering a place to Drink and DErive!  Daily lectures and long-winded impromptu chats on all things Math related.  We are proud Purveyors of Crunchy Snacks, plus we have The Best Friday Morning Sunrise Cocktail Party on the playa (not to mention being home of the fabulous Electric Cupcakes).

name: Mayan Warrior
description: Mayan Warrior is both a camp and a massive moving stage.  After years of collaboration and inspiration, a group of artists, designers, musicians, builders, wanderers, lovers, and festival designers created Mayan Warrior to bring an underground culture from Mexico City D.F. to the Playa.

name: Media Mecca
description: Media Mecca is home to the members of the Media Team that volunteer to assist press, filmmakers, photographers and other members of the media in the endeavor to document the cultural story of Black Rock City and Burning Man. Come on by to register your media project for publication or to meet up with other photographers, videographers, or journalists.

name: MegaBounce
description: Chill place for past, present, and future friends.  We have a bounce house!  Come for a bounce, then stay for the fun!  ;)

name: Mellow Mountain
description: Come day or night for crazy swing and carousel play, cafe-table drinks at high-noon, stuffy fluffy toys, and a smooch and tunes from Kissy Fish mutant vehicle.

name: Menagerie
description: A unique collection of carefully and principled curated characters make up the Menagerie; a village of unique and fun participants with the excitement and open eyes that Burning Man freely unbosoms. With virgins, fresh, new and open to experiences, next to slightly-experienced and partially-wise veterans and many transitioning between condition make a spectacular experience ready for all who arrive in Black Rock City wandering the rudimentary playa. Menagerie is curated to create, expose and enjoy from the primitive, gruff and young, to the mature and refined, sophisticated taste of a discerning wanderer.

name: Mental Floss
description: Mental Floss will be located in Gigsville this year and will be providing many opportunities for shared insanity, hilarity, and fun.  Please join us for Drag Queen Bingo, Angry Hour, and Playa Post Secret, and more (see even listings for more info).

name: MerKaBah
description: We at Merkabah Camp are committed to doing the deep evolutionary work, as individuals and as a tribe. Our community is coming together to curate transformational experiences, where in programming is dedicated to bringing in the most profound healers, doctors and experts to share knowledge of holistic health and wellness, earthly stewardship, and shamanic healing.

name: MidNight Popcorn Palace
description: Serving the Burning Man Community since 1999... The Famous Midnite Popcorn Palace will be returning home this year for one last tour of duty in BRC. Our goal for this year's Carnival Of Mirrors theme is to give away 700 pounds of POPCORN TO THE PEOPLE! We're coming out of deep retirement for our big Grand Finale Party Tour! We specialize in good old fashioned service and genuine burner hospitality. Join us nightly for fresh organic popcorn with your choice of exotic seasonings, visit our 24 hour flossing center, chill-out in our swanky East Indian Popcorn Lounge; plus no doubt our camp will have many more wonderful surprises and yummy  goodies for you that we hadn't even thought of yet when we wrote this...

name: Midnight Poutine
description: Bonsoir nos amis! Come and sample Québec's favourite late night snack at Midnight Poutine. Learn the awesome power of french fries, cheese curds and hot gravy. Embrace the joie de vivre of our french Canadian camp.  Lâche pas la patate!

name: Midnight Ridazz Camp
description: Bike repair and F.U.N from Los Angeles and Oakland.

name: Mighty Misfits
description: Throw your pecker, challenge your tit-tac-dic, toss your vagina, paint your body, have your fortune read and savor a photo with the Oracle. All games hosted from 2:00 to 4:00

name: Milk & Honey
description: Milk & Honey strives to be a home for connection and transformation. We draw on secular and spiritual traditions to create experiences where individuals and communities can heal, grow, and express themselves creatively

name: Mimosa Sunrise
description: Mimosas at every sunrise. Join us at our Bar as the sun rises for good drinks, great stories and awesome people before you call it a night.

name: MindShark
description: MindShark is a community of neuroscientists, engineers, and artists who have pledged their crotches and cerebral cortices to stoke the eternal flame that blazes at the core of every individual, friend, and stranger. We all come to Burning Man to explore our inner selves; let MindShark guide your awakening with gifts of science, fire, and light.

name: MINSTREL CrAMP
description:
Feeling the need to blow, beat or stroke on something?   
Come to MINSTREL CrAMP and get your creative "musical juices" flowing.
Stop in, Listen in , Join in, to some great live acoustic, jamming with our house band "THE BURNING SENSATIONS".
Check the schedule board out front to see what's happening or sign -up for a slot to perform with your own band (or ours)
It's all good!   
Listeners welcome!

name: Miracle Wonderland Carnival Comp.
description: The Miracle Wonderland Carnival Company is the firm that employed the Wizard of OZ as a balloonist prior to his being whisked away to OZ.

name: Mirage at the Oasis
description: Is life an illusion and happiness a mirage? Come find out at Mirage at the Oasis.

name: MIR camp
description: Own way (Cradle of MIR in 2013) Art Support Camp

name: Misfit Island
description: None

name: Miso Horny
description:
Miso Horny is all about refining ourselves and each other. We value humor, communication, playfulness, open mindedness, and creating strong meaningful bonds between one another. On the Playa we gift hot miso soup, sake, and herbal aphrodisiacs, as well as engaging conversations with our guests. 

There are camps at Burning Man that offer public spaces for sexual play and exploration. While we fully support those groups, we choose to instead explore sex positivism by creating a safe event space for healthy dialogue of human sexuality. Our mission is to share ideas and philosophies that aid in the discovery of our sexual selves. We have created, and are always improving, a dedicated workshop and event space that is a platform for our lifelong journey of learning.

name: Miso Soup Camp
description: The Miso Soup Camp believes that the miso will replenish lost nutrients to the burners on the playa. We are serving our AMAZING miso soup Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday from 9:00 am till 11:00 am.

name: Mission Country Club
description: San Francisco’s Mission district outpost on the playa. Eleven years and going strong!  Beer, cocktails and pretentious coffees served daily. Monday night we host the 3rd Annual BRC Hip Hop Ball!  Tuesday at 3pm we host an Afro-Carribean Drum circle.  And...the tradition continues...come by on Thursday at 4:20 for our 11th Annual Sangria SoundClash Party: dance to Cumbia/Salsa/Merengue while devouring 50+ gallons of Sangria.

name: Mobility Camp /BRC DoA
description: Mobility Camp is an accessible Camp Providing Mobility services and Accessibility education in Black Rock City.

name: MobQ Village
description: MobQ Village is the home of BAAAHS Station, DivaNation & Adult Playspace.  Come on an adventure on one of our art cars or explore our public courtyard.

name: MOM CAMP
description: None

name: Monks of Funk
description: None

name: MOONDRIVE
description: We are a group of people who enjoy taking things to the next level.

name: Mooninites
description: Pass thru our mirrored entrance and leave the harsh playa for shade, misters, climbing structures, drinks, a foam pit, and more. All are welcome on the moon, so come make a dustmask, dance to some beats, and become a lunar lunatic with us.

name: Moonwalk Mission
description: Moonwalk Mission is a station for Playa explorers, space cadets and anyone set for out-of-this-world experiences.

name: MOOP Map Headquarters
description: None

name: More Carrot
description: We're More Carrot, the Black Rock City farmer's market. Tuesday through Friday from 8AM to 10AM, we will be in French Quarter serving much needed nutrients to playa in the form a fresh locally sourced produce.

name: Mo's Mini Martini and Erotica
description: Mo's Mini Martini and Erotica Camp

name: Mr. Peepers Closet
description: Need to spruce up your playa attire? We have wedding, prom, and casual dresses, hawaiian shirts, tutu's, tie dyes and lots lots more stuff. We have Body Painting too. Let Mr. Peepers help you find your Playa persona. We gladly accept clothing donations.

name: Mudskippers Urban Decay Cafe
description: The Mudskipper Urban Decay Cafe is a close knit gay-friendly diverse camp with a history at burning man that goes back to 1993, Come chill out in our cafe or make a handy dandy craft in our craft lounge, all are welcome!!!!

name: Museum of Industry Science & Tech
description:
The BRC Museum of Industry, Science, and Technology (MoIST) pays tribute to both the real and fake people behind all the amazing inventions that make BRC and Burning Man possible.  In addition to a traveling exhibition of the BRC Museum of Transportation History (which you may remember from Burning Mans 2013 and 2014), MoIST tells the stories of the brilliant, enterprising, or just plain lucky folks who brought us things like the hydration pack, rebar, the porta-potty, EL wire, the zip tie, and so many more.

And don't miss the museum's bar: the MoIST-Tang Ranch.  At the bar will be served...moist Tang.  Patrons may decide how moist they want their Tang.

name: Music Savages Camp
description:
We classify Music Savages as a Lounge Camp. This is a hybrid between your traditional Sound Camp and Relaxation Area. By blending hand selected music provided by international talent with art, comedy, comfort, and an intense lack of drama, we create a unique oasis off the beaten path. We prefer to stay out of the limelight - making it a pleasant surprise to stubble upon if you’re exploring without a set destination. 

Experience the 360 sound system and sound-2-light installation for performances, relax to ambient music after-hours, bounce around on Kangraoo Shoes if your timing is right, motorboat some titties after a fresh shotgun to the face, and toss the bocce or baggo with your homies - ALL at Music Savages Camp.

name: Mutant Machine Town
description: Mutant Machine Town offers a number of different shady bars in one village with art cars and kinetic sculptures sprinkled between awaiting your discovery.

name: Mycodelic Forest
description: The mycodelic magic of the redwoods awaits you! We'll be dancing and giving away free hugs 24/7. If your timing is right, our Wizard has been perfecting his homebrew to quench your thirst! Maybe you'll stumble across a peaceful massage, a read aloud at sunset or an impromptu dance party! Our family is full of enchantment, each with our own talents to offer, bring your hOOp, your glow and fire toys, your cup, and that smile and we'd love to move with you!

name: Mystic Midway
description: The Mystic Midway Pop-Up Carnival Camp and Tea Tent Town

name: Mystics
description: The Mystics invite you to seek out the hidden and unusual truths within. Inspired by the transformative and the transcendent, come find a world of Fortune Tellings, Palm Readings, Crystal Balls, Tarot Cards, Mask-making, Question Games, a scavenger hunt, a Moonlit Masquerade and plenty more.

name: Mystikal Misfits
description: Everything your parents warned you about.

name: Mystique's Sky Lounge
description: Mystique's Sky Lounge is an oasis on the outer rim of the BRC for Esplanade weary travelers looking for a respite from the hustle & bustle of the playa. We serve fabulous libations and enjoy 360 degree views of the BRC. Morning meditation sunrise sets and down tempo grooves are our specialty.

name: Mystopia
description: We are a family of friends, partners, cousins, parents, children, gays, straights and every thing in between, a family of different-minded, like-hearted people who bring an oasis to the playa. At Mystopia you can enjoy our gigantic misting tent, French Toast brunch, and Reverse Cowgirl Creamery. The Bright Young Things are bringing the Luxarium and the Banter Bandits some serious social lubricant. Come play with us!

name: Nåårsførtown Village
description: Everything your parents warned you about.

name: Naked Heart
description: Naked Heart is devoted to the full embodiment of the Divine Feminine. We offer amazing experiential and experimental workshops that allow you to feel your feminine heart your radiance your inner goddess. This work requires the masculine as well; Everyone is welcome.

name: Naked Human FussBall
description: Naked Human FussBall

name: Naked Rainbow
description: Welcome to Naked Rainbow, the Strip Club for your Soul. Get ready to expose your dreams, flash your fears, and get naked -- spiritually naked, that is! Share aspirations on the Tree of Dreams, or unburden woes on the Tree of Prayers. Align mind and spirit with prayer, meditation and yoga. Connect to each other with modern partner-dancing in costume. Even if it’s as simple as dancing to live beats, sharing a Harry Potter cocktail, joining our sunset flow sessions, or spinning fire with us on the Playa, we hope you leave the Naked Rainbow with the most vibrant hues of your soul revealed.

name: Nakked Zebra Bazaar
description: A fantastic carnival inspired boutique for any and all to enjoy. Please come find just the look your after, or donate anything that you think others may need to find their true "burner" self!

name: Naughty Naked Neti Camp
description: None

name: Nectar Village
description: Nectar Village is about you. It is about what you need… to survive, refuel, and revitalize. Mind, body and spirit are all served, and you’ll find the nectar you seek for any of them, in the camps at our oasis. Offerings continuously from 10am to 7pm.

name: Neverwas Haul
description: Come visit the Neverwas Haul, a self-propelled 3-story Victorian house on wheels, while we travel the Playa and visit the various art installations during the day and evening. We will also be open for tours at our camp at various times in the afternoon.

name: New York Dangerous
description: Well, you can't say your mother didn't warn you!  Join New York Dangerous for our annual Running With Scissors race 3pm Wed, plus our Strangers With Candy snack machine, Put Your Eye Out Shooting Gallery, Talking To Strangers discussion series, Playing With Fire medallion burning station, and Dangerous Liaisons social yurt.

name: Nice Nice
description:
We are an international group of artists, musicians, yogis, dancers, scientists, and creators.

We invite you to enjoy daily musical jam sessions around specially crafted interactive 8 foot long chimes (tubular bells), the Playa xylophone, and two deep-pitched gongs. Discover neon sprites of glowing plasma that moves in response to the human touch. Chill out under our shade or next to our virtual well and its aural delights. And, of course, the flamingos are expected to return, too.

Join us for a Wednesday pre-sunset white wine and music soiree.

name: Nipple Crime
description: Camp Nipple Crime has the intention of crackin down on nipple crimes committed by the citizens of beautiful Black Rock City. We encourage all sorts of nipples and creatures alike to take part in the creation of their very own personalized pasties.

name: Nom De Plume
description: Come drink yerba mate, listen to dubs, burn copal and palo santo and thrive.

name: Nordic Space Camp
description: The Nordic Space Camp let’s us reflect on who we are by seeing ourselves from space. Come experience the universe through three interactive art installations, and join us in establishing the first art installation on the moon.

name: North Bay Freakshow
description: The North Bay Freakshow is in full effect in our city of dreams in the high desert plain. Come play with us! We are fire spinners and midway performers from the San Francisco North Bay and we'd love to get our freak on with you.

name: Northwest Mist
description: Providing a soothing Northwest atmosphere to escape the mid-day heat with misting, music and body paint artists. Step through the Northwest Mist portal and transcend the heat of the day for a momentary refreshing encounter.

name: Nose Fish
description:
Welcome to Nose Fish. Carpe Diem at the Un-Hammer Cafe. Get creative making Playa currency to exchange for your coffee. Don't forget your cup.Take a moment to meet the folks standing near you.  Start/end times vary.  

Stop by in the afternoon for a juggling class, EL wire electronic repair, a bike repair class. Check our schedule board for the activity of the day. 

Come back at night to dance before the MEZ interactive Video Mirror.

name: Nothing Butt Art
description: We supply the canvas and paint, you supply the cheeks, together, we will create nothing butt art. We also feature body stamp temporary tattoos . Stop by, make some art and get a tramp stamp.

name: N-Toxicade
description: We are a twisted arcade dedicated to messing with your perception of video games as an art form by either changing how you play the game or even the game itself.  Plus Booze... N-Toxicade!

name: NUTZ
description: Here comes the sun. Beautiful beats and positive vibrations overflow the Playa at Nutz Sunrise Parties. Get some.

name: Oasis 47
description: Oasis 47 is an interactive jewelry camp featuring bronze theme related pendants which Citizens can embellish using resin inlay.

name: Octopus Garden
description: Come play with us at the Octopus Garden. Tramp loungers, art gallery, public library, jewelery treasure chest. If it's under the sea, it's at OG.  Enjoy some Pussy Punch, rev your engines in our dildo races, and squid to the beats of our Octo-sound. Though we love Pussy, we still aren't an orgy camp… yet

name: #Octothorpe
description: Come # with us!

name: OFOSHO
description: We are a spirited group of burners who deep within our souls are artists, creators, constructors, experimenters, poets, photographers, videographers, dancers, musicians, singers, foodies, theorists, geeks, givers, lovers and above all else burners.

name: Oh No You Didn't
description: Be our guest and get it off you chest at our playa confessional lounge, featuring libelous libations and scornful judgment by our panel of experts.  Commiserate with the best as we help keep your shame in perspective.

name: OKNOTOK
description: Bingo, funerals, sing-a-longs, live art, weird movies, disco, and a 20 foot tower with the most comfortable seating on the playa. All this and more at OKNOTOK.

name: Om Bindi
description: Om Bindi welcomes you with a frisky mantra and a bindi on your forehead to open your Third Eye (all the better to see the Carnival of Mirrors).  After you get your bindi, awaken your senses with a variety of irreverently pseudo-spiritual gatherings, such as panty-free 11:11 meditations, Hand Reflexology (aka hand-jobs), Cigar Appreciation sessions and Belly Dancing lessons (see our daily event schedule posted at our camp).

name: )'(Ooligan Airways
description: 00L1GAN3 experienced heavy turbulence whilst carrying a cargo of Mirrors destined for a carnival in Romania. Going down in a ball of flames (yet again), the )'(Ooligans find themselves stranded in the desert, yet again.  Fortunately they have enough mirrors to signal rescuers many miles away.

name: Oontz Pouch
description: OONTZ OONTZ OONTZ!

name: Opulent Temple
description: Sacred Dance to World Class Music since 2003.

name: OraculTang Family
description: SDV people present OraculTang.

name: Orbital Landing
description: A stopping place for wayward travelers - for a year or forever. Diverse group of eclectic friends with a shared appreciation for good vibes.

name: Organization
description: The Organization: Espresso Martini Parties 1-3pm Tuesday-Saturday

name: Orgy Bus Camp
description: We host a variety of adult themed play parties in a safe and consensual environment. Must be 21 years of age to attend. Identification is required.

name: Orphan / Endorphin
description: The Orphanage welcomes you to stop by and enjoy some home crafted cold brews at the Pub while watching your fellow burners bleed in the Carnival Death Race and Hippie Hunger Games, or partake in a fine smoke from our Daddy Warbuck’s Cigar lounge. Extra Curricular activities include: Endorphins by Night, U TRAMP!, Hippie Fishing Hoist,  Al Pachinko’s Time Zone Arcade, 24/7condoms and cuddles will fill you with fantasy and wonder.

name: ORPHANS TOO
description: ORPHANS TOO is part of the Orphanage group of camps (not a village), and is dedicated to providing a haven in Black Rock City for virgin burners and lost orphans from around the world.  In 2015 ORPHANS TOO has 70 burners and will be located in the bustling suburbs of the City.  ORPHANS TOO is home to the Asylum, a very popular dive bar, providing microbrews, homebrews and home-infused vodkas all week.  ORPHANS TOO also hosts :  The Big Top Boudoir, including the Cabinet of Curios and the human Ouija board; Baron Oink’s Latex Vac Bed and Flogging Stool; the Funky Flower Garden, a collaborative art project; our live music and theatre group called the “Hard Knocks”; the “Sputnik” Fire Barrel; and many more interactive projects provided by our virgins and orphans.  ORPHANS TOO is incredibly relaxed, and there are no duties or obligations to fulfill … Fuck Yeah!

name: Otis Spankmore
description: Come for the Spanking; stay for the cookie. A Pavlovian expreience that you can't miss. We want to thrill you with our Fun House of Spanking! Come one, come all over 18, you won't have to wait long to be spanked and rewared with a cookie!

name: Otter
description: Otter is an oasis of love and conscious celebration.  This is the 20th year in a row in which we, the Otter Clan, bring our big love, laughter and fancy pants dancing to Burning Man!

name: Outside Inn
description: How does your inner desire express through your physical self?  Is your persona a true reflection of you or is it all smoke and mirrors?

name: OverFuckinRated
description: RevoFuckinLution is back and we are OverFuckinRated as ever in this year's Carnival of Mirrors. Come daily and let us heckle the hell out of you while you enjoy a drink, or better yet, grab a megaphone and join us. We will provide excellent shade, libations, and heckling games during the day and a fire at night. Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday nights we will have the bar open all night till we run out of the Best Northwest craft beer!

name: P3: The Princess Party Palace
description:
Our camp hosts Wedding Dress Wednesday with the Princess. We we invite the participates of BRC to come play dress-up with Prince S. Stephanie. We offer a parade that will begin someplace and end someplace. We will offer playa marriage ceremony officiated over by Reverend Mike. Is it leagal? - You may ask... Our answer... well meh... it could be. 

You can also grab a drink in our bar, spin the wheel of Safewords, and/or get a new pair of panties.

name: Pair-a-dice
description: Pair-a-dice is the place to come for good company, good tunes and drink at the bamboo bar. You just might not want to leave this oasis in the desert.

name: Pair-a-dice @ The Beach
description: Come see us at Pair-a-dice @ The Beach, It's where all the good stuff happens. The Beach, A Bamboo Bar and a Fish Tank…yeps!

name: Palinka Lounge
description:
PALINKA LOUNGE & BOUNCE
Palinka is a Hungarian alcoholic delicacy, distilled from a variety of fruits like plum, apricot, apple, pear, grape or berries!
We'll be serving these with Rose Spritzers for everyones enjoyment while one can create their very own handmade crafts in our dome.
Come join the Huns!

name: Pam's Parlor
description: Come one, come all to Pam the Albino Mastodon's Tattoo Parlor!  Burners are invited to take refuge from the heat and adorn themselves with silver-and-gold flash tattoos that will last the entire week of the Burn.  We will definitely be around Monday-Friday 10am-2pm, but feel free to come by any time and say hello.

name: Pancake Playhouse
description: Pancake Playhouse feeds the dustiest, hungriest burners our world-famous pancakes while providing the antidote to oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz in the form of soft rock featuring Captain Flapjack and the Syrup Sisters.

name: Pandora's Lounge & Fix-it Shoppe
description: We are an eco camp that runs on solar power, we specialize in educating others in repairing their bikes and more. Our lounge is a great place to hangout and wile away the hours with a drink or two with friends old and new.

name: PANORAMA
description: PANORAMA offers 24 hour unobstructed 360 degree views of Black Rock City and the surrounding environment from 30 feet above the playa. Most climb stairs every day, but rarely do we do it with a sense of excitement over what we can gain by reaching the top! Join your fellow citizens in elevating your perspective!

name: Paradigm
description: Paradigm 2015 is your portal to your default world self. Come record a video message to your default world self and we will send it to you in six months!

name: Paradise Motel
description: Paradise Motel, established in 2008 with members hailing from our Default World locales of SF and LA, is the most garish of roadside motels; yet the best of the "no-tel" genre, where weary travelers are invited to stop in for a snow cone and enjoy some progressive beats while lounging by the "pool".   Join us for snow cones, a chill place to relax and to find out what other fun things there are to do in the Gayborhood at our Concierge Desk every afternoon, Sunrise yoga most mornings, and our “Gypsy Mirrorball” event on Tuesday.

name: Parasol Mafia
description: The Parasol Mafia is dedicated to helping you energize and sustain your body, heart, and mind. Enjoy our shaded self-care station with essentials like sunscreen, earplugs, chilled water, electrolyte drinks, and other sustenance; groove with us at our reggae/ska happy hours; decorate and keep a paper parasol; revitalize yourself in our covered dome with guided workshops; get funky at our night time dance parties; Love yourself, it’s an offer you can’t refuse.

name: Parea
description: A Parea in Greek culture is a group of friends who regularly gather together to share their experiences about life, their philosophies, values and ideas. The Parea is a venue for the growth of the human spirit, the development of friendships and the exploration of ideas to enrich our brief time together in this life. On the Playa, the Parea is a long-lasting cycle of creativity that is much greater than the contribution of any individual participant.

name: Party Naked Tiki Bar
description: We’re back serving morning Bloody Mary’s at 9:00am and cold Tiki Punch for ages 21 and over starting at 11:00am (ID required). Enjoy the sounds of classic rock in a cool, relaxing clothing optional environment. You never have to get naked to enjoy but if you do, you may get “leid”. Come party with us for our 7th year & please bring your own cup to be LNT friendly.

name: Pedal Pies
description: Pedal Pies is a culinary and sensory experience camp. Look out for our delicious wood-fired pizza (cooked by mobile pizza ovens when and where you will least expect it), and come visit the Blind Diner for blindfolded sensory experiences including taste, smell, sound, and touch.

name: Penny Smashing Point
description: Dear Burners! Bring you penny and we will smash it for you or take one we have for you.

name: People of Color Camp
description: People of Color Camp is an open space to explore the connection between the radical self expression and social justice.

name: People's Art Congress
description: People's Art Congress welcomes Burners to 3 exciting Interactive Art Projects: Black Light Portrait Painting, Black Light Marionette Theater, 3D Kaleidoscope. Come paint our faces, pull our strings, and have a 3D view of your surroundings. Open day and night, after dark viewing is enhanced by UV lighting, accentuating the 3 ring circus effect.

name: Perky Parts
description: None

name: PermaGrin
description: None

name: Petersons Pink Pagoda
description: Petersons Pink Pagoda - where the lost get found on Rod's Road

name: Petting Zoo
description: 15th Edition of Petting Zoo. Best Bar on the Playa several years running.  We welcome newcomers and hope to share the experiences of the playa all while offering an array of creative cocktails, ice-cold draft beer, imbibing beverages, and our classic and exclusive 'pussy juice'. Daytime Bar Only. We open same time as Artica (coincidence, I think not, hint hint). Close at sunset.

name: Pharos
description: Pharos of Black Rock City: a beacon, a place for rest and reflection, an enclave of beauty and light. Create your own light show with our twenty-foot tall Wonderlamp.

name: Philly Phreak Show
description: Philly Phreak Show Midway project.

name: PickleBack Mountain
description: Come for PickleBacks. Stay and ride our Bucking Pickle!

name: Pickle Joint
description: Crisp, cold, brisk pickles - and so much more - from the generous wenches and noble studs who've been serving you for 13 years. Giving until it hurts.

name: Pigeon Palace
description: Pigeon Palace is a BRC Camp based out of Santa Cruz, CA. A motley crew of dancers, delinquents, and daredevils living peacefully beneath the watchful eye of Monsieur Pi-jean. Coo, coo!

name: Pigmalions
description: None

name: Pile Palace
description: Here at the Pile Palace, we provide an unbelievably lavish, Moroccan-themed environment for Burners to pile hard. This is the ultimate Pile habitat. Whether you choose dancing your heart out to our amplified sound, lounging back in one of our pillow pits with a craft cocktail in hand, or taking in the unforgettable view of the Playa at the top of our Pile High Club, we want you and everything about you in a state of complete relaxation. Pile on.

name: Pink Fuzzy Monkey
description: Get twisted at camp Pink Fuzzy Monkey with one of the funnest themed twister boards on the Playa, sunset dj sessions, and crazy fun parties. And if you really wanna get charged up, stop in at our Banana Bunch phone charging stations and plug yourself in!

name: Pink Heart
description: Pink Heart invites you to our oasis of shade, fur couches, chilled cucumber water and love. Recalibrate your body, mind, and spirit in our Pink Lounge while connecting with fellow travelers.  Connect & share experiences while gazing upon the open Playa, or enjoy carnival games and vegan ice cream!

name: Pink Lightning
description: Pink Lightning is a camp for runners, and home of the Burning Man Ultramarathon. Love us and all of our PINK PINK PINK lightning bolts. www.burningman50k.com

name: Pink Mammoth
description: Pink Mammoth is a not for profit house music and creative arts collective based in San Francisco. We strive to create an environment of love and compassion, selflessness and support, health and vitality, that encourages everyone we encounter to shine and thrive.

name: Pirate Ninja Training Camp
description: We offer Pirate Ninja training to all that dare accept the challenge.  Learn the ways of the ancient Pirate Ninja masters.

name: Pixelstad
description: International hub of Art, Music, Performance, Yoga, and Bingo

name: Plaisance - Carny Coral Backyard
description: Plaisance is a camp of Healers and Midway Carnies. We'll offer Reiki, Massage, Aroma Therapy, Energy Healing, Emotional and Mental Health, Meditation, and more.

name: Planetarium Aquarium: Reflect!
description: Planetarium Aquarium: Reflect! will provide a multi-dimensional, interactive experience that invites participants to explore themselves and the world around them through the 4 Media of the Galaxy: Earth, Water, Fire, and Space - the true void that connects everyone.

name: Planetarium Camp
description: The Planetarium's star speckled outer walls surround low seats inside to give the participant a view of the night sky, free of the light glare from Black Rock City.  Additionally, "artificial" constellations, meteors (Some making shapes), UFOs and other celestial events are superimposed over the real night sky in real time.

name: Planet Earth
description: Planet Earth...Black Rock Cities indoor New Wave night club.  two dance floors and a lounge in a 2,000sq ft building.  Open every day from 6pm to 4am.

name: Platybus & the Band
description: Black Rock and Roll! Come jam on the roof of the Galactic Crusader as the sun sets on our fair city. 6PM daily. Electric Guitars, drums, bass, banjo, and more noisy toys. Play or party, drink and be merry.

name: PLAYA 54
description: PLAYA 54, An Afternoon Delight, spins the best of the 60s, 70s, 80s, House and so much more! COME DANCE!!

name: Playa Bike Repair
description: “Playa Bike Repair” is both a service and a theme camp. ON-Playa:  We run a “Bike Lounge,” with a bar, mist, music, shade, and tools. Mechanics drop in. Friendly, nurturing, and supportive, they will gladly help you fix your bike! Last year, we helped over 4000 people fix their bikes! PRE-Playa, we offer bike rentals and transport; your support funds Playa Bike Repair.  Volunteers, mechanics, and campmates wanted.

name: Playa Broadcasting Network
description: The Playa Broadcasting Network is the only mainstream (totally not mainstream) media conglomerate producing content at Burning Man. We're innovating entertainment media on the playa one fake program at a time.

name: Playa Choir
description: Connect with the Something Other often overlooked at Burning Man. Your Playa Choir welcomes all Burners to come and participate in a fun 4-part harmony of classic sacred and secular songs. Rehearsals are Tuesday through Saturday 11:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. To listen, please join us for the Sunday SUNRISE Performance at the Temple, or the Full Choir non-denominational, non-religious but entirely welcoming, spiritual and moving “service” at 11:00 a.m. in our Dome. Singers of all skill levels, and persuasions are welcome :) Also looking for Musicians! Contact maids_service@yahoo.com for more information or swing by our camp on the Playa!

name: Playa Court
description: Playa Court - A place to argue, laugh, and learn.

name: Playa Glass
description:
Ever wonder what's in playa dust?  The special formula is just right for some solar glass making.  Grab a pair of our welding goggles, and we'll set you up at a Fresnel lens station where you'll raise the temperature of the dust to over 1000F and melt it in to black glass.  Turn it in to a wearable pendant at the craft table, and you’ll have an easier-than-a-bag-of-dust way to take the playa back to the default world.
Ever wonder what's in playa dust?  The special formula is just right for some solar glass making.  Grab a pair of our welding goggles, and we'll set you up at a Fresnel lens station where you'll raise the temperature of the dust to over 1000F and melt it in to black glass.  Turn it in to a wearable pendant at the craft table, and you’ll have an easier-than-a-bag-of-dust way to take the playa back to the default world.

name: Playa Info
description:
At Playa Info you'll find:
° Oracles who will help answer any questions with their
profound wisdom, and help you locate just about anything you
need within the vast resources of Black Rock City
° Directory computers to: register yourself and your camp; find friends' and theme camps; browse or add events and art; find or offer rideshares; send and view messages
° Lost & Found
° Bulletin Boards available for artful posting of events, messages and general information.
° BRC Map with placed theme camps, art, and other places of interest

name: Playa Jazz Cafe
description: Nightly Live Jazz Jam sessions and irish coffee.

name: PlayaNauts
description:
We are the PlayaNauts! Explorers of the Playa. We've collected interactive games from around the globe.
Volley ball-sized Beirut game or come chill in our 1500sf of shade while you play our various drinking games (we I.D.) Stop by the Bar to try our Playanaut Punch, and don’t forget to Check out our Event schedule for Party, Tournament and Flash-Bar times...Look for our Scarab ArtCar!

name: Playa Pete's Plaza
description: Playa Pete's Plaza / The Monaco's home port.

name: Playa Piano Bar Camp
description: Playa Piano Bar Camp offers Dueling pianos and open mic as part of Black Rock French Quarter. Our roaming playa Piano Bar Art Car welcomes you to join us for some dueling piano and drinks as we roam the playa from venue to venue The Art car is giant Grand Piano floating on an elevated platform , bar and lounge.

name: PlayApology
description: Black Rock City’s first “Custom Apology Delivery Service” offers Playa-friendly flowers, Burner-centric cards, and singing “SorryGrams” to those seeking to make “playAmends” to a fellow BRC resident. Drop by one of our Sorry Soirees!

name: Play)A(Skool
description: We are Play)A(Skool - an international group of movers and shakers dedicated to creating a learning and experiential platform for citizens to Black Rock City to participate in.  We are the home of TEDxBlackRockCity and proud to host the 5th annual TEDx on playa.  In addition, we host Black Rock City Art Forum where the makers, designers and operators of Art Cars share their stories with all.  We host Fuck Up Fridays where you can share you story of your greatest fuck up and what you learned from it.  On Saturday we are all things Burning Man and we feature speakers from different areas of Burning Man to share their stories with you.   In addition, we have some pretty legendary parties . . . our Tuesday Homecoming Party is always a great way to start your Burn.  On Friday night we feature some of the best up and coming International DJ's.  At Play)A(Skool we believe that sharing leads to learning.  And learning leads to personal growth.  And personal growth -- helps us evolve.

name: Playasophy Camp
description: Welcome to Playasophy, a space to rest and reflect in the excitement of the carnival. Come in the mornings for coffee to start off your day, and in the afternoons sit around a hookah, enjoy a beverage and share stories and experiences with both our members and other travelers! In the evenings, enjoy the splendor of the Wonderdome, a fully controllable immersive light display while resting in the House of Soft. We hope to see you soon!

name: ¡Playasos!
description: Welcome to ¡Playasos!, a light-hearted and inclusive community with a love for play, spontaneity, and exploration. Come experience El Campanario, the Tunnel of Transcendence, Euphora Borealis, Electric Stationary Joust, and the live music of Esteban and The Clowns.

name: Playa Surfers
description: Surfs up on the playa! Come get some rides on our motorized surfboard or just come by and chill with us on our lifeguard tower or huge shade structure featuring some of LAs. top DJ's.

name: PlayaWaste Raiders
description: PWR features a visually appealing frontage reminiscent of an apocalyptic wasteland outpost. A return of our grisly street games, including Interactive Post Apocalyptic Reader's Theater, The HATE Bar, The Church of the Children of Atom, Tuesday Morning Church services for the Army of Shirt Cocking Elder’s of Latter Day Saints,  The Prophet in the Desert Tower, NERF Wars street raids, A Mutant Nerf Shooting Gallery, Radiation Aversion Therapy, and of course, RAIDERBALL!

name: PlayCreate
description: None

name: Playfully Yours
description: Playfully Yours is a well equipped dungeon play area for beginners to advance players with focus on the beginners and curious as we proved a variety of equipment and toys to play and experience. We offer daily scheduled classes with demonstrations and participation, as well as, individual instruction where we can show you the proper use of the equipment and toys and help in facilitating your play.

name: PlayGround
description:
'PlayGround' -  because most good games are dangerous and many are against the law...

Older children play vigorous games and must have places especially set aside for them.

Come to the PlayGround Experience.  Play is a fundamental need.

name: Plays Well With Others
description: Plays Well With Others is happy to offer Burners Lavender Hand Wash, Wedding Services, Regression Therapy, and Jewelry. Our services will be available Tuesday-Saturday Noon-4:00. We also will host a cocktail party Friday night honoring the Carnival of Mirrors.

name: Plunderground
description: A place to interact with fire, found objects and friends.

name: Polegasm
description: Come over to our exclusive facility. We provide the best equipment and instruction there is for creative essence, existential growth, and Polegasms!

name: Poles N' Holes
description: Come and get your pole dancing groove on with Kefff and Fluffer or show off your skills on any one of our master shafts. Or just hang out and have a drink at our cozy oasis while enjoying the show.

name: Pollen Nation
description: Buzz buzz and welcome to Pollen Nation. Hailing from Denver Colorado, we're a busy group of worker bees with installations including The Crackery and The Tuck N' Taco Taqueria.

name: Pollination
description: Full service Instant Weddings performed under whimsical floral art in Pollination's Love Chapel.  Enter into a life long union on a whim.  You probably might not be sorry.

name: POLYNATION
description: Bounded by a finite chain of straight line segments closing in a loop of love and honey known as POLYNATION.

name: PolyParadise
description:
PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds and Washing the Bodies of Playa Citizens from  '2:00 - 10:00'  for the past 16 years.

We are a group of Polyamorists seeking to live our dreams, and this camp is one manifestation of that. Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relationships, with honesty among all partners. 

Join us in a variety of events - Come in from the sun....take a load off your feet...

name: Pongo
description: The Pongo Lounge is a casual posse of peeps dedicated to a low drama, stunningly psychedelic couch lounge complemented by visually appealing games, including some custom designed ping pong tables. Come for the comfy, come for the shade, come for the company, come for the gaming, come for the evening parties.

name: Pookah Lounge
description: POOKAH LOUNGE!  GET UP! GET DOWN! GET BACK UP AGAIN!  DO YOU FEEL ANY DIFFERENT?

name: #porchlife
description: #porchlife invites you to relax, take a load off, enjoy some conviviality, maybe a bit of pickin and grinnin, and just watch the world go by from our Old Timey 1880's era redwood storefront. #hashtagsareplayedout

name: Porch Times
description: A moon-shine enduced heckling camp with a touch of southern hospitality.

name: Porn and Donuts
description: Porn and Donuts – Come for the Donuts, stay for the Holes!

name: PORTSIDE LOCOS
description: A group of high desert middle eastern drummers. come by for a drum lesson, a Hafla party, or just to jam and dance. experience random moments of connection and immediacy at the hug hut, or rest from the heat at the hydration station.

name: Possible Project
description: Swing by the Possible Project's Photo-Phunhouse for refreshments and photographs.  Our carny camp is the perfect backdrop to park your traveling show, featuring daily analogue instant PhotoDome events where you can strike a pose and take it with you.

name: Post Nuclear Family
description:
Come Visit the Atomic Wishland!~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~Shade in the Fallout Shelter
~~~~Free Electroshock Therapy
~~~~The Neon Painting Lounge
~~~~~The Black Light Dungeon
~~Morning Zen Tarot with Rodin (Wednesday noon-3)
~~~~~~~~~~Sunset Savasana
~~~~~~~~Robotting Workshops (with Shaantibot)
~~~~~~Heckling & Good Vibes 
~~~~~~~~~~~DJ Also Starring (Thursday night)
~~~~~~~~~Electric Dunkaroos (Sunday afternoon) 
Come Visit Your Post Nuclear Family!~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

name: Present Camp
description: Your presence is requested!  Come to Present Camp and delight in the joy of the now.

name: Preservation Society
description: The Preservation Society: An oasis amidst ephemeral modernity; shelter from progress, efficiency and cruel indifference. “God save little shops, china cups and virginity.”

name: Pretentious Fox
description: A very international and inter-state gathering of pretentious foxes and other eclectic and venerable animals! We provide an essential neighborhood BAR and STAGE with good MUSIC and instruments for OPEN-MICS, and several EVENTS including Bloody Mary Brunch!

name: Pretty Pickle Camp
description: A relaxed outpost on the road to nowhere featuring cold pickle service to passers by 12pm-2pm daily. Also offering hand-crafted pickle warmers, pickle pasties, and pickle rings, stickers, and bottle cap pins while supplies last!

name: Primate Playground
description: Step right up to the nonstop carnival at the Primate Playground. We have events with Monkey Carnival Games, Flying Monkeys, 80’s Dance Party, Viking Ice Hugs, BubbleTron (It’s SCIENCE!!!), Bacon and Jimmy Buffet hour. OR just come be a lazy monkey and meet some Primates on our luscious astro-grass under the shade of the flying monkey hut, SizzleVille style!

name: Prismaticamp
description: A community of LED light artists. Join us each night at dusk for prismatic reception, interactive LED art projects and games, and our nightly community LED procession to the night Playa.  Also see the schedule for daytime interactive activities including Yoga classes, and Zen Bell ritual.
