name: Prof. Pigeon's Psychedelicures
description: Come meet the Live Birds and undergo a fun head exam by a panel of birdbrain doctors who administer a series of Psychedelicures - art and illusions designed to invoke realizations of your innermost self.

name: Prometheatrics
description: Bringing the Gift of Fire to Humankind since the Dawn of Time! Come experience the fully immersive Tesseract Mirror Box (Put on the rainbow glasses and be dazzled by an infinity of strobelights!), enjoy edifying Flow Temple workshops during the day; then join us for full-on fantabulous fireshows at dusk and dawn.

name: Psychic Taxi
description: None

name: Pussy Day Spa
description: We will amuse, entertain, and exhilarate you as well as compliment your shoes.  We are the perfect place for your pussy to visit to be pampered, refreshed, relaxed, and rejuvenated.

name: Queen Dick
description: Lost? Tired? Thirsty? Looking for some company? Fancy a chin-wag? Want a good old knees-up? Don’t know what knees-up means? Doesn’t matter, step out of the desert and into our marvelous time and mind bending new-age-old-fashioned boozer the Queen Dick, and its village green, where anything and everything could happen, and maybe more.

name: Questionable Behavior
description: Questionable Behavior?

name: Que Viva! Camp
description: Migration is Beautiful!  A mix of Carnaval and Mardi Gras, Que Viva! (Celebrate Life!) camp will roll with Latino and Cajun music, migration stories, and butterflies, symbols of metamorphosis. Come paint your wings to wear around the playa!  Tell your migration story in our video photo booth!  If you do, you'll get your BRC "Permanant Residency" green card.  Check What, Where, When for wing-making times.  No art experience necessary.  Hammocks, chairs and tables create a welcome respite in the shade. Que Viva! emphasizes bringing artists, change makes, and social justice advocates from communities not traditionally represented at Burning Man, people of color, immigrant folk, and activists – to create a more inclusive BRC where everyone’s voice and spirit are uplifted.

name: Quixotes Presents “The Dr’s Box”
description: Quixotes’ returns  in 2015 to present “The Dr’s Box” our very own Carnival Attraction and Bar – The T.A.R.D.IS!. Our gift to the desert is a Bar and open mic  with an open mic Cabaret Stage where you can come and realise your performance fantasies, join us for a tasty cold beverage and enjoy the show either as a performer or expectant participant  just arrived to be awed by our performers.

name: Rack em Up
description: Rack em Up is back again! Located in the Black Rock City Science Center village, we won't be hard to find. Come have a drink and shoot some pool. You can use our sticks or bring your own. Have fun playing with our balls!

name: Radio Electra 89.9 FM
description: Radio Electra 89.9 FM. We put the ROCK in Black Rock City! Offering an eclectic array of music, mayhem, commentary and art. Camps, villages,and artists wishing to make radio announcements about events may stop in or contact us by email prior to the event. Please feel free to email us or drop off any prerecorded announcements you may have. You can even come in for an interview. We want to hear from you about what you do to participate.

name: Rainbow Bridge
description:
This year's theme, Carnival of Mirrors, asks: who is the trickster, who is being tricked, and how might we discover who we really are? Our response is that humans can discover their true nature through yoga and meditation. Self-discovery is a process of lighting up the mythic metaphor of the "rainbow bridge." Anodea Judith writes that "on our journey through life, the chakras are the wheels along this axis that take the vehicle of the Self along our evolutionary quest, across the Rainbow Bridge, to reclaim our divine nature once again...to restore the Rainbow Bridge is to reconnect to our own divinity, anchoring it in the world around us and healing the rifts that so plague our world."

In interacting with other burners, we would like to focus on 7 chakras over 7 days. We will offer a daily practice tied to each Chakra leading up to the lotus / crown / diamond chakra the day the man burns.

name: Rainbow OASIS
description: RAINBOW OASIS is the outpost of gay culture you've been dreaming of! Come straight, come gay, we don't care just come thirsty!

name: Raised by Wolves
description:
Raised By Wolves is a transcontinental pack of artists, healers, performers, and builders who are inspired and impassioned by the classic story of feral children and their wolf pack families. Each year we bring our untamed energy to the Black Rock desert through play, performance and art.

Our gifts this year include our Cafe, where you can get hot locally-roasted coffee every morning, and Ziza the Roving Tea Truck. We will also be hosting a speaker series each day, with a lecture followed by a more interactive workshop.

name: Rancho Sparkle Pony Rodeo of Fire
description: Rancho Sparkle Pony: Rodeo of Fire.  A place to celebrate your inner Sparkle Pony.  We don't care how hard you've worked today, just come and be beautiful!  We've got refreshments, a cool place to take a break, and good music to keep you from sitting on your ass too long.  Check out our art cars, when they're in the chute.  And learn a thing or two from our wranglers and fire performers.

name: Random Pants
description: Are you too big for your britches? Is your cod-piece not sitting right?  Did the sun go down and now your ass is freezing?  Stop by Random Pants get yourself a new look (on the lower half, at least).  From slacks to gators,  we've got you covered.

name: Ranger Headquarters
description: None

name: Ranger Outpost Berlin
description: None

name: Rat Trap
description: The bar that never closes.

name: RealDilla
description: None

name: Reared In Steel
description: Come visit the Madusa Madness camp and enjoy a drink during happy hour.  Take in one of our scheduled fire shows at Center Camp and hop a ride around the playa on the fire breathing Rhino.

name: Recess
description:
Our big ass board games bring all the burners to the yard, and
they’re like, “hey, this is pretty fun.” Come for the games, stay to
get schooled in DJing, juggling, and the fine art of hula hoop.
Don’t worry, we’ll make time for recess.

name: RECESS!!!
description: Ever miss the third grade, when recess was the best part of the day? So do we - almost an hour a day of unfettered frolicking, chasing, tagging, hopping, skipping, jumping, so long as you don't linger too long over lunch! "RECESS!!!" will capture this magic - there will be an elaborate magical playground to inspire play, an daily unschedule of fourth grade games, and a grumpy lunch lady who will reward and resolve disputes with spankings by wooden spoon.

name: Recycle Camp
description: Monday through Sunday, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. you can stop by to crush and recycle your aluminum cans at Recycle Camp. Be sure to come by before they close Sunday evening! Recycle Camp can be found at 6:00 ON THE INNER CIRCLE OF CENTER CAMP, just behind the Center Camp Café.

name: Red Bar
description: Red Bar (formerly Cornhole Bar, Farmopolis, ...), an oasis popping out of the desert, red and glowing at night, invites weary travelers to float through our halls to find the inner sanctum of libations and live music at the piano.  Sit down and play, or listen and sing.  Bring your instruments and see what develops.  We are always open and will have daily drink specials plus games and entertainment.  You will also find nooks to create art and walls to hang it on.

name: Red Lightning
description:
Red Lightning- Arrow to Evolution
Red Lightning was born out of a desire to bring balance and healing between the masculine and feminine on Earth as a first step towards a cosmic consciousness.  To learn more about who we are, what we do and what we are bringing to the Playa, visit us at www.redlightning.org
See you in the Dust!

name: Red Nose District
description: The Red Nose District is an interactive camp.  Come and enjoy our Pedal-powered bumper car track, sidle your stilted (or non stilted) self to our High Chair Stilt Bar and relax in the majesty of The Stoop in a friendly open community and a welcoming family for anyone who wants to be part of the fun. And what carnival-esque world wouldn't be complete without puppet shows?

name: Red RubberTattoo
description: Red Rubber Tattoo - Lavishing temporary rubber-stamp tattoo art or your personable topography since the last century.

name: Rejuvenation
description: Rejuvenation gifts coconut water and supplements to the playa semi-daily. Catch us in camp or out on the playa.

name: Reno Housewives
description: Helping costume BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US -- From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered.

name: Reno Nation
description: Reno Nation is a collaborative effort between several smaller camps working towards showcasing our favorite parts of Reno to BRC.  From meditation and yoga, the flow arts, to the 24-hour nightlife.

name: Retrofrolic
description: BDSM dungeon and experienced staff with everything needed to learn and explore your sensual desires, fantasies and fetishes.  LGBTQ inclusive environment full of  exotic games and sensual experiences and that cerification you never sought!

name: Reverbia
description:
Reverbia- Known as the "Portal of Live Music" or "Oasis of Live Music at Burning Man", offers Live Music programming 18 hours a day/night including: Live Music Yoga in the Morning, Live Dance Workshops, Song, Dust, Sing (Black Rock City's popular singer/songwriter showcase and open mic), our Concert in the Shade Series, Reverbia Live Nights (featuring International, national, and regional festival bands), and After hours Jam and Chai. 

 Come Chill, Vibe, Dance, and Celebrate Live Music on the Playa!

name: RhythmWave
description:
Proud to return to Black Rock City for our 9th consecutive year, the RhythmWave theme camp is dedicated to the practice of Conscious Dance as a moving meditation. With no experience necessary and no "steps" to learn, Conscious Dance provides a path - the destination is the discovery of ourselves and a return to our center.

Facilitators from around the globe offer multiple daily sessions of Conscious Dance and movement on our 2,000 sq. ft., fully shaded and easily-accessible bamboo dance floor. RW also hosts morning yoga and meditation, as well as workshops and intention circles throughout the week. All citizens of Black Rock City are invited to bless the bamboo at RhythmWave. Please join us!

name: Ridiculicious fun house
description: Drop by the fun house chill out, check out the illusions, discuss meteorites or just join the crazy clowns for a hold up.

name: Risa
description: RISA is a resort planet, renowned for its breezes, beaches and friendly atmosphere. Our main attraction at RISA during the afternoon is our Snow Cones.  Evening Mutant Vehicle rides on the Mistress Amadee and the Dancing Peacock.

name: ROASTED
description: Come join us as we play host to evening socials featuring drip coffee and chai tea – ensuring that participants are properly caffeinated before their night-time activities. Our homegrown nonsensical storytelling will surely entertain as we share our unique blend of art with you.

name: Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux
description: Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux will be again roasting coffee right on the Playa while serving the freshest coffee in Black Rock City.  Come join the fun and grind up your own special blend of coffees from all over the world, then pull up a chair or pillow and hang out under our shaded pavilion.

name: Rock n Bowl
description:
Play some over-sized pool on a giant black light reactive billiard table or maybe some giant beer pong or cornhole.  

Visit the dome where you can relax or create your own laser light show using various levers and gears.

name: Rock Star (Camp Rock Star)
description: Camp Rock Star hosts multimedia rock concerts every evening, complete with a magical stage, psychedelic lighting, video projections, and, of course, incredible musicians and bands. Our goal is to infuse the Playa with the incomparable energy of the live concert experience, and inspire other burners to take the stage.

name: Rogue Nation Village
description: Home to a group of camps from the PNW; KremeBurners, SeaWEED, and Moulinsert. Seattle's village for large art, Crème Brule, and "Comfort".

name: Rootpile
description: Rootpile is a camp providing live Bluegrass Music and food at Burning Man. We will also have music instrument workshops and a geat chill space.

name: Root Society
description: Root Society continues into our 13th year at Burning Man gifting a place to dance and celebrate. We are passionate about creative architectural design, music, dance and visual arts. Root Society is based on the roots of our friendships and the amazing connections we make on the playa.

name: Rumi's Tea House
description: Join us in exploring the beauty of Persian poetry over tea and hookah in our peaceful tea-house.

name: Run Free Camp
description: Run Free is a clean and sober Burning Man camp for folks whose common goal is enlargement of spiritual life through new adventures in being human and living life to the fullest.

name: Russian Roulette
description:
Russian Roulette? Why the heck NOTsky?

We will turn people in to Russians and turn Russians in to people.

name: Sacred Cow
description: Desert wanderer! Join the mystical culinary odyssey of the Sacred Cow as we romp through BRC on the Sacred Cow Hajj rooftop restaurant- lounge-mutant vehicle! Catch the Hajj spouting delectable smells down your neighborhood street, or toss fantastically fabricated food stuffs to the land locked participants below: such technological wonders of flavor they have never experienced. Sunset dinner cruise art tours. Late night playa picnics. Moonlit Temple Feasts. We always need kitchen help!

name: Sacred Spaces Village
description: We are a community co-created by an eclectic group of wonderers, healers, dreamers, and mystics.  Each year we offer a place of sanctuary and solace on the playa.

name: Safety Net, The
description: Come and get yourselves caught in our safety net! Be a silly-clown fish, crabby crustacean, or a try to be a high wire champion.  You will be lured, caught, and treated by semi-professional experts in the realms of circus-fishing.  If you're not into being fishy, come place your marks of art on our scrolls and get chill in our shady shack.

name: Saints and Sinners Camp
description: Saints and Sinners Camp-  home of the Ashes to Ashes Dust to Dust project for painting naked bodies and arranging them in varies formations for Photography.   Later posted on an art website.

name: Sake II Mi
description: Visit Sake II Mi Camp for sumo wrestling mania and spectator joy!

name: Sakenoma
description: SAKENOMA, A Burning Man staple for sake lovers; where all are welcome to saddle up and get down

name: Sake To Me
description: Sake To Me is your neighborhood sake bar! Stop by for a comfortable shady pitstop, some great chilled sake, and test your skills at a giant version of Jenga.

name: Salon Soleil
description: Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression, and interaction with other beings. We invite the Burning Man community to visit our friendly, comfy quadruple Do-Me Domes any time, stop by for our funk dance party, Black Rock Chamber Music, or enjoy one of our Healing Faires offering massage, readings, or relationship counseling.  Also, come feed your power hungry devices and fill depleted batteries at our solar charging station!

name: Salty
description: We are salty, nautical, and play daytime R&B at home base..... and rove in Gracie-Pleasure-Pier by night for the best view of the playa.

name: Salute Your Jorts!
description: Our camp is about good ol'fashion summer fun.  The care-free friendly competition of lawn games, combined with the best pair of jorts you'll ever own will take you away from the pounding beats of adulthood.   Join us to laugh, play, sing and have a ball!

name: Sandbar
description: The Sandbar is a Bedouin themed bar with a shade structure, drinks, bites, activities, and entry to the Foreign Cinema and Avatar Dome.

name: "Scar Bar" aka Bermuda Triangle
description: You will be rewarded greatly for showing us your scars! Talk, drink, relax, and brag at the Scar Bar!

name: Scarbutts Coffee
description: Scarbutts Coffee wakes you up with a brisk spanking and a great coffee. We serve coffee from 9am to 1pm Tuesday through Friday. We wake your ass up.

name: School of Consensual Kink
description: All the classes you wish were available when you were in school -- Black Rock School of Consensual Kink (S.O.C.K.) offers a variety of classes and BDSM tastings by our faculty of trained kinksters. The kink curious of all genders, orientations, and identities (18+) are welcome, see you in class!

name: School of Safe Sex
description: The School of Safe Sex is a casual environment inviting guests from all corners of the globe and all walks of life to come together for an amazing burn. Our relaxing, judgment free, venue features shaded space to take a break from the heat, scheduled classes with various sexual topics, class time school snacks, class time prize wheel for free sex toys and hygiene kits, 1920’s style mutoscopes with tasteful yet sultry rated adult movies and dispensers with free condoms. This is our way to unite the community through a positive and educational experience involving love and sensuality regardless of gender or sexual preferences.

name: Scotch & Hop
description: Scotch & Hop a place for the young and old, silly and serious to have a good time and jump around. With a variety of games of hopscotch, everyone is invited to join in, and play a game and when finished hang out, and reminisce at the Scotch bar and enjoy some wonderful libations. For the younger in the crowd we have treats so that they can relax after some hopping. It's a great place to get out of the sun and remember such a simple fun game.

name: Scrabble Camp
description: Scrabble Camp, Come play Scrabble on our big board.

name: SeaWEED Artist Collective
description: SeaWEED Artist Collective. Bringing Seattle to the Playa in the form of our large burnable art.

name: Second Star
description: Bringing the funk to the Playa! Join us for groovy tunes ranging from soul to disco, jazz to funk, brass to hip-hop, as well as great conversation and beautiful people.

name: Secret Passage Camp
description: A small camp dedicated to the secrets we all carry within us, helping share ourselves with each other, with the help of a bit of booze, a place to hangout, a photobooth, and more.

name: Semper Ardens
description: Camp Semper Ardens, meaning Forever Burning, exists to advance all that is learned on the Playa and carry it forward into daily life.

name: Sensual Pleasures (The Camp for)
description:
The Camp for Sensual Pleasures is dedicated to providing pleasure for women in an environment that's safe, comfortable & private.  

We offer hair washing and massage by Pope DB, the well-known Orgasamator Experience is back, enhanced to give women an even more intensely enjoyable experience, and the very popular Eros Tangeré, an Erotic Sensation Performance, is coming to Sensual Pleasures this year.

name: SERENDIPITEA
description:
SERENDIPITEA, meanwhile let's have a sip of Tea. 

SERENDIPITEA focuses on the communal aspects of tea rituals around the globe. Tea is something close to our hearts in the UK, but is also a significant to many different cultures; whether it is a tall iced glass of sweet tea in the southern US, or a steaming cup of mint tea served from a silvery teapot in Morocco- all are symbols of hospitality and friendship bringing us closer as a whole. We took a lot of inspiration from the Book of Tea written in 1906 by Okakura Kakuzō of Japan in English, he addressed the growing concern of clash between the east and west cultures. The struggle he speaks of resonates with the modern cultural issues facing society, the very issues that Burning Man explores.

name: Serenity Now
description: Serenity Now coffeehouse returns for its 3rd year on the playa! Bringing its  smooth cold brew coffee, delicious teas, and welcoming atmosphere, Serenity Now has your caffeine fix.

name: Servants of the Secret Fire
description: “You cannot pass," he said. "I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the flame of Anor. You cannot pass. The dark fire will not avail you, flame of Udûn. Go back to the Shadow! You cannot pass.”

name: Settle This Like Men
description: A place to express your feelings and work through issues in a more direct, face punch-y way. Camp Settle This Like Men brings you their own brand of Kinetic Dispute Resolution Workshops, hosted in our very own fight ring.

name: Sexagon
description: Swing by our singular six-sided living room, climb 20feet to our 360 degrees of BRC  Observation Nest, 20 feet high (seems higher). On Monday, our EYE CANDY staff will hook you up with a new look from our selection of sweet wearables that's sure to please, zip thru the PlayaPilot bikeway to earn your Official Pilot's License, and the HoopDome welcomes hoopdance extroverts of all levels; we have shade, tunes, and extra hoops for you.

name: Sextant
description:
Sextant is all about high energy fun, whether it be kinetic, electric, or just durn eclectic.

We've got a huge set of Tesla Coils, a Tower featuring Vünderbar (ze bar in ze sky!), a 52' Crow's Nest, heck we've even got a chill lounge if you're tired... and it's all for YOU!!!

name: Shady Asylum
description: Shady Asylum - 1600 square feet of shaded grass, providing evaporative cooling and iced tea for cracked-out burners. Open daily.

name: Shady Lady Saloon
description: A Western/Burlesque themed camp serving bourbon and bourbon inspired cocktails. Come enjoy a cool drink and learn about the history of bourbon, our National Spirit!

name: Shadyvil
description: Shadyvil returns to 2015 Village style.

name: Shady Waffle
description: Shady Waffle is a full-service breakfast restaurant in a brilliantly colored elliptical dome. Come eat, cool off, relax, and say hello.

name: Shallow End
description: The "Shallow End" hosts interactive theme parties within "Martini Village".  Come and meet your fellow Burners and enjoy all of our activities and libations.

name: Shamandome Camp
description: SHAMANDOME CAMP birthed out of Heebeegeebee Healers Camp in 2006.  40 workshops, healing 1200 burners by core shamanism drumming journies. Our Find Your Power Animal workshop twice daily across the week  trances to DIRECT ACCESS TO SOURCE. and Wake Up the Shaman in You. We address war, sustainability, individual crises, harem management, soulretrival, extraction of neg energies, by CHANGING YOUR DREAM. We get you back on playa opened to epiphanies you flew in for.

name: Shamanic Journey
description: SHAMANIC JOURNEY - A place to learn, grow, share, interact. Explore shamanic practices, energy, and exercises.

name: ShangriLa
description: Welcome to ShangriLa a paradise on earth. Shade areas will provide a cool space for yoga classes, Enchanted Hand Jobs (hand-massage), energy work and a communal chill area. Our Weinkeller ShangriLaLa will host daily wine happy hours. Drink wine and get lit during Pimp & Wine where we will embellish your ensemble with gifts of light-art to keep you safe at night. Namaste!

name: Shangri-Lawless
description: A forgotten paradise to soothe the wary adventurer, or a lawless land of risk & reward? We are both.  A yin and a yang.  An amalgamation of two elements, each playing off the other.  Villaging with the prodigious Wet Dreams crew!

name: Sharkey's Bar and Lounge
description: Sharkey's Bar and Lounge - The Preferable Party Past the Porto-Potties. It's the neighborhood bar where burners come for a drink, stay for the mingle and leave with a positive spirit to be shared throughout Black Rock City and beyond.

name: Shibumi
description:
Shibumi - n. - (shi-boo-mee)

1. A rare kind of personal excellence.
2. A state of effortless perfection.
3. Where's Andrew?

Serving craft cocktails, good music, and great people, Shibumi is a relaxing stop-off to dance, sing, and revel. Join us for a drink!

name: SHIFT
description: SHIFT provides the ‘set and setting’ for you to have a shift experience; a shift in paradigm.  How can you create this for others and how can you engage and create this space for yourself?  We ask you do things you would not normally do.  Get dirty, get involved, participate, pick up trash, fill your own RV and ‘wipe your own ass’. This is not just another weekend at the disco. www.shift-bm.com

name: Shipwreck Tiki Lounge
description: Hidden in the palms behind the ack ack gun at the end of the runway is a sandbagged hideaway run by misfits, stocked with shanghaied liquor and torpedo juice. Air raids and shore patrol be damned, we're still alive so tonight we're gonna party like its 1945. Merry Christmas Tulagi 1945!

name: Shock-A-Chakra Project
description: Freak your aura, shock your soul! Manifest complete control! Once you’re in, you’ll see the light! Behold the sight of chakra might! Step right up if you dare, don’t forget to be aware! Race your colors up the line, shock your chakra, become divine!

name: Short Stack & Om Skillet
description: Short Stack & Om Skillet bring you a chill park vibe and gourmet grilled cheese in the desert. Join us at 1pm from Tuesday thru Thursday to lounge on our lawn with sandwich service and some groovy tunes. Tuesday afternoon is the Tutu Tuesday dance party!

name: Shotkra
description: None

name: Shots for Shocks
description: An electrical tasting bar: We zap you with a shock, you get a shot!

name: Shwar Town
description: Shwar Town has been holding it down on the playa for over a decade. Come drink Kombucha to stay refreshed for all you other adventures.

name: Siberian Electric Company
description: A Soviet era nuclear power plant somewhere in the back waters of Siberia. Come by for a cool drinkski. Our accents are bad but the drinks are tasty.

name: Sideshow!
description: SIDESHOW! Carnival of Smoke and Mirrors.  Looky looky! It's all on the inside!  Sideshow brings you a traditional old time sideshow experience with a decidedly BM twist.  See the strange and the weird... marvel at exclusive exhibits in the Odditorium of Playa Wonders, and gasp in awe at astounding magic performances by masters of the craft.  Put yourself in the show and be a freak of nature, or test your wits at games of skill. Daily performances at 1 pm, Monday through Saturday, and late night magic performances too! Check the WWW Guide for times and details!

name: Silicon Village
description:
Ladies and Gentlemen, boys and girls of all ages open your eyes and your mind to the mysteries and wonders of Silicon Village (look for our tower and archway). Travel to the distant other side of our Stargate, travel at feet per second on our 200’ zipline, climb a tower, explore what is beyond this world with a tarot reading. Are you timid of heart? Then relax, have a drink, and enjoy a fire hooping show, choose a heart on to be painted on you, watch the bees dance. Early bird? Have a coffee. Feel the need for salt? Have a pickle. Feeling naughty? Have a cookie, but at a price (or pleasure). After all of this and you are still feeling blue then visit a Happy Spot. At the end of the day control light with your mind or sit in our sauna dome.

Is your mind blown? No? Well aren’t you the adventurous soul. Okay then, hop on one of our art cars or dance to a laser light show. If that doesn’t make your day then be a part of a game show or our Twerkin’ Fashion show.

name: Silky Way, The
description: The Silky Way, the home of music, stories, and cuddle puddles.

name: Simian Akademy
description: Come one, come all to Dr. Googol's Simian Akademy and marvel at the advances made in the Anthropomorphic Sciences, the most astounding of natural philosophies!  See the Octopus Pavilion!  Marvel at the dexterity of trained monkeys as they demonstrate their industrious utility by repairing velocipedes of every sort and size!  And lest we neglect the fairer sex, consult with our resident Mistress of Olfaction who will concoct a custom perfume for you right before your very eyes!

name: Sin City
description: Sin City is a place where freedom of expression is embraced and "What happens in Sin City stays in Sin City." There is always something happening and there are many things to see and do at the Party Naked Tiki Bar, BRC Airbrush, Sin City Day Spa, Sin City Costume Exchange, Sin City Art Center, Sin City Volleyball, photo opportunities and much more.

name: Sin City Art Center
description: Come by any time to enjoy our collection of Burner Art created by camp members and local Burners. See what creative minds have made for you to enjoy. Please, be respectful of the artists that have contributed to create this display and do not vandalize or steal from the art center.  Thank you.

name: Sin City Costume Exchange
description: Donations of new or gently used costumes are welcome starting Monday. Come browse our selection of playa costumes that we’ve been collecting starting on Wednesday. Let our girls make you over and leave with a fun new costume for the playa and you can even pay it forward when you donate a gently used costume that no longer suits you. Come early for the best selection.

name: Sin City Day Spa
description: Have a mini “MIRACLE SHOWER” and learn how you can “shower” on playa with two glasses of water and feel squeaky clean. All you need to do is bring your own towel. Other services include foot massage/moisturizing, sun screen or aloe vera application, manicures and more. Come by and check for hours of operation and full services list.

name: Sin City Volleyball & Rec Center
description: The Sin City Volleyball Rec Center is where you can go to get your game on. Our enclosed volleyball court is perfect for games of volleyball, badminton, disk soccer, dodge ball, hooping and more. Check out our matches or come enjoy free play time with friends or even join a game and make new friends.

name: SizzleVille
description: Stop on by for that extra Sizzle!! Revel in your Dusty Bumm while taking a snowboardski or 3, immerse yourself in fur at the Tookus Lounge, feel at home while you get to know your fellow South Bay burners, or just monkey around at the Primate Playground.  Official kickoff spot of the Busty Bacon Brigade, the Home Brew Tour & the Bubble Brigade.  We're here to cook you up some goodtimes!! )'(

name: SK8 KAMP
description: Every city needs a skatepark.  We bring one to Black Rock City for everyone to enjoy.  All skill levels. Ride anything.

name: Skinny Kitty Teahouse
description: Skinny Kitty Teahouse serves tea 24 hours a day all week long. We offer a refuge from the hustle and bustle: shade, shelter, couches, a piano, performance space for spontaneous use and the company of several unfortunately emaciated felines.

name: Sleazy Beaches
description: Sleazy Beaches, home of the cool butts.

name: Slutgarden
description: Cum suck down our Slut juice, wrap your body in our love and pound your hips to the rhythms of the playa.

name: Slutt Putt
description: A round the clock nine hole mini golf course for everyone, even stilters! Come play a round and sip an Arnold Palmer.

name: S'mores N Amour
description:
S'MORES!  Come roast a marshmallow and we turn it into a delicious S'more.  Kids of all ages are welcome.  Campfire singing and storytelling is highly encouraged.  Marshmallows will be burned!

Also, Dr. Who visits Camp S'mores N Amour....come see his TARDIS and the PANDORICA.  Come find out if Time Lords eat marshmallows.

name: S.N.A.P.
description: SNAP stands for Silly Nerdy Act

name: Snowflake Village
description: Snowflake Village is a hub of interactivity from thousands of miles away.

name: So Far So Good
description: Possibly the only mini-golf course in all of Black Rock City! Come and putt around with or against your friends and prepare to go head-to-head in the Wednesday tournament.

name: Soho Gardens
description: Soho gardens provide daily Ashtanga Yoga sessions, morning Chillits parties, relaxtion session, English Tea Time, projection of old back & white movie and a 60 feet observation tower.

name: Solnishko Yozh Reflections
description: Solnishko – russian word for baby-sun, Yozh – russian word for hedgehog. We are an eclectic group of Bay Area touchy-feelers, international russian affectionados and uncategorizable veteran burners. We will offer space for self-reflection and contact, rest and challenge, olfactory and body stimulation and facilitate sensory and sensible connections. We will recreate the life-giving atmosphere of the Sun, the life-affirming energy of hedgehog and space for reflection in our Temple, beverages and snacks, in unapologetic soul mating rituals.

name: Something Freaky This Way Foams
description: Something Freaky This Way Foams combines the talkiest old time carnival you can imagine with an interblastive foam rejuvenation experience unlike anything on Earth!

name: So Much Yes
description: Bringing you tropical deep house at our tropical theme camp! We are a group of fun positive people from all over the world, come and experience the tropics in the desert and see what all the YES is about!

name: Soup
description: None

name: South Bay HardCORE Camp
description: South Bay HardCORE - the home of the South Bay Burners region.  Join us for our on-playa Meet & Greet and hear how to connect with fellow South Bay Burners year-round!

name: Space Ambulance
description: None

name: Space Cowboys
description: Look for us our on the range wrangling with something new; Dirty boys and girls spreading the love, lending a hand, meeting and greeting with new groups and peps. Need a hand come by and say “HI”. Maybe you’ll get lucky and be invited to our watering hole or a spectacular ride on love Martha. www.spacecowboys.org

name: Space Gnomes
description:
Intergalactic Party Enablers.
Just remember, there's no place like gnome!

name: Space Hole Mist Opportunity
description: An interactive camp for some things that we have learned about making a great non-RV camp!  Be more comfortable for less $$ and meet great people without being stuck in a box!

name: Space Jam
description: Come on and slam, and welcome to the Jam! Space Jam hails from British Columbia and celebrates everything celestial! Come say hi and have a Caeser on us!  Watch out for those Monstars though, they're sly.

name: SPACE TRAVELERS
description:
Our camp is the place where everyone becomes a Space Traveler.
It’s a cleaning up service for you body and soul where every person remembers where they come from and cleans up the channels of connection with the Universe.
Once you come by two cosmic greeters give you a quick introduction of both physical and mental activities we provide and a ticket to any planet of the whole Universe.
To start with you clean your body at the check in point with two big brushes which are spinning by the wind force. To finish up with the body you might want to have a Cosmic Shower under clouds. Then you are welcome to participate in the Gong Meditation, where each gong is tuned to different planet frequency. Two Gong Masters will activate your cosmic beginning vibes. Also you could join them and make some music with different musical instruments. Afterwards you are welcome to drink Gong Water (Prana water) and leave some gifts by the Altar.

name: Space Virgins
description: The Space Virgin Arts Collective is a 501c3 non-profit arts group with the mission of building community through collaboration. We started as a Seattle-based Burning Man theme camp in 1994, but we have since grown and our projects include off-playa art projects and events. In keeping with the Burning Man philosophy "no observers, only participants", our art is often interactive and experiential, plunging participants into theatrical-style sets and engendering joyful, transformative experiences.

name: Spank Bank
description: Spank Bank- we are your playful, sensual playa spanking experience. We tease & torment your bottoms while satiating your thirst with a cold drink in our commemorative cups!

name: Spank & Spray
description: None

name: Spank the Monkey Bar
description: Wet your whistle at the Spank the Monkey Lounge, enjoy virgin burner shots, playa friendly poontang (aka the playa screwdriver) as well as other refreshing beverages.  They come with free harassment from our assortment of monkey clad bartenders, we'll try not to throw poo.

name: Spanky's Village and Wine Bar
description: None

name: Sparkle Camels Costume Bazaar
description: Want to update your playa look?  Come by Sparkle Camels Costume Bazaar for new, recycled and traded fashions.   We will make you over!

name: Sparkle Love Oasis
description: Come share some Sparkle Love with us and be rejuvenated with a refreshing cool beverage in our luxurious lounge. Bootys and Boobies appreciated playfully ALL WAYS!

name: Speakcheasy
description: We are an eclectic group of Oklahoma and California Burners who wanted to be the Grapes of Wrath, but there was a copyright infringement and we went with Speakcheasy! Come and get some cheesy snack, Sangria, conversation and shade during the day.  We would love for you to stop by!  Figure out the camp password and get something FUN to forever cherish! Look for our daily happy hour in the What Where When!

name: Spice N Vice
description:
Spice N Vice - offers bedouin hospitality every day from 12-4 p.m. Visit us for some hot or cold chai tea or Arabic coffee. Talk to one of our travel sages for stories about life abroad and travel advice.
https://www.facebook.com/SpiceNVice

name: Spicy Krunchy
description: Camp Spicy Krunchy is home to P.A.M.E.L.A artcar. Come chill with us at the spicy dome, learn what’s new in the field of alternative energy and dance to some electronic tunes!

name: Spirit Dream
description: 12 means established.  12 years of coming home to the playa.  12 years of spirit interaction, mothering, fathering, blessing, elevating, sowing, reaping, laughing and sharing.  Spirit Dream is our home, where our heart is and we hope you will join us.  Stop by and we'll fill your water, stay a bit and enjoy our expresso, a while longer and you will start to transform.  Feel the strength bubbling up from the land and the refreshing rain falling from above.  We will look to see your original design and embrace it with you.  We will speak life to that which was lost and bring healing to that which was broken.  We come to the playa to see you, to meet you, to embrace you, and to release you into something far greater.  Come and let us serve you and your purpose on the Earth.  We can't wait to see you...

name: SPK - Sparkle Pop Kitten
description: Cosmically comical cats that love a good laugh, fine drink, and a tall trippy tree.  We also happen to be the art support camp for TrEeD - a giant tree bike rack.

name: Squirrel Army
description:
Are you Squirrel enough? 

The Squirrel Army needs YOU. After a nuttily successful expedition in MMXIV, the Squirrel Army Black Rock Expeditionary Force MMXV is launched and headed to space! Seeking recruits of all stripes: astronuts, flying squirrels, and others with flight or orbitational experience are especially encouraged to apply. 

Come run The Gauntlet to find out if you are squirrel enough to join our ranks. You will scamper across a telephone wire slackline, climb our mighty oak, swing in our zero gravity simulator, fire the Nutapault, and sing the Squirrel Anthem. 

If you are successful in your mission, you will be rewarded with a badge, medal, and most importantly your Squirrel Army name and rank.

PRO NUCES ET GLORIA // GIVE US YER NUTS

name: Stag Camp 9
description: Stag Camp continues celebrating radical self-reliance though offering our spirit of social inclusiveness mixed with personal responsibility. We offer a large group shade, music, games, workshops, a happening neighborhood bar, and friendship.

name: STAMP IT! CAMP
description: STAMP IT! Camp is back to for the third year.  Come get your Burning Man 2015 souvenir stamped on any item or body part of your choice.

name: StarBarf
description: Across the space/time continuum, through galactic upheaval and hiccups, we have evolved to this messy existence. Colliding and reforging, StarBarf weaves workshops, discussions, and movement into our shared vision of community. We strive to connect with beautiful and messy humanity; the humbling scales in which we exist; and the unbounded possibilities that we, as StarBarf, realize... You are StarBarf, too.

name: Stardust Lounge Casino & Spa
description: Go all-in at the Stardust Lounge Casino and Spa! Double down on some dirty martinis and dirtier games of chance and skill at the Casino, get your playa wedding on at the Chapel, then clean up and cool off with rejuvenating treatments at the Spa.

name: StarFist
description:
Come and take refuge in our Eastern oasis, the Nargileh Tent. Turkish coffee or maybe a spot of afternoon tea? We are Stars when it comes to hospitality, whatever your pleasure.
Or come gaze at the stars with the Stars on our Star Tower – by day survey the city or by night the bright lights as BRC comes to light and life.

And last but not least, home to the infamous GO POSTAL! 	- independent message delivery service (at your service!). Our streetfront booth is open for you to send a message across the playa to the recipient of your choice. Our international fleet of mystery is at your service!

name: STAR STAR ROADHOUSE
description: We bring a risque mix of cabaret-style theater and live rock and roll to the playa. Sexy, physical, thematic. Daytime acting, movement, yoga, and twerkshops throughout burn week in our shaded venue. Night time shows and public bar with custom cocktails to wet your mouth and loosen you up!

name: Steampunk Saloon
description: A nomadic 1880s style watering hole showcasing DJs, live music and performers of all kinds.

name: STEEP
description: At STEEP we value immersion into love, laughter, and the sacredness of living life to its fullest. Join us for a cup, a workshop, conversation, and creating something beautiful to remember your burn or gift to a loved one.

name: Stellar Dusty Moon
description: From the makers of SpinCycle comes Stellar Dusty Moon! Where the drinks are out of this world, as are the workshops and the fun!

name: Sticky Fingers
description: Sassy, sexy and sticky sweet, take a nostalgic trip back to the 50s with our friendly retro camp, with members outfitted in just aprons, and sample from our selection of succulent, thirst-quenching treats while enjoying true Southern Hospitality.

name: Strange Gardens Bear Magical Frui
description: Join us at sunset for our nightly Sunset Champagne Sing-A-Long, the bubbles will flow and so will the tunes! Stick around afterwards and you may be graced with pizza from The Fascist Pizza Stand-we fire up the oven and hand out hot fresh slices at our whimsy-how will you be made to earn a slice of this playa pie?

name: STRANGELOVE
description:
STRANGELOVE - we're a flight-themed bar with a dark sense of humor. 

Stop by and help us turn the Playa into Ground Zero, one booty-licious track at a time . . .

name: Street Life:Childhood Meets Playa
description: Picture Big Bird swigging a 40 while Barkley and the Martians dance to whatever music was on the radio during the decades of your childhood.  From Public Enemy to Madonna, Beastie Boys to Beyonce, enjoy music that runs the gamut  of genres while still making you nostalgic each time you recognize those first few notes of that song you used to love.  When you take a break to catch your breath, enjoy some snacks and grown-folks lemonade, play a few games, and raid our craft stash to decorate yourself like your favorite character.  Come dance your way down memory lane with us, as we combine the nostalgia we feel for Sesame Street with the swag, bounce, and flavor of the music we love.

name: Struts & Bolts
description: A unique dome experience.

name: St. Squishy's
description: St. Squishy's Summer Camp for Wayward Children brings the fun and innocence of your old, childhood summer camp to Black Rock City! We provide an environment where burners of all ages can come to play just like the good ol' days. Come jump in the ball pit!

name: SugarBitch Camp
description: We gift the citizens of Black Rock City with low carb snacks, advice on low-carb living on the Playa, and vinegar footbaths in conjunction with The Poly Paradise Human Carcass Wash. Sugar addicts, seek your relief here.

name: Summer Camp
description: We invite you to enjoy Summer Camp as an adult while still letting your inner child play! Be transported to our cozy forest where our talented Camp Counselors are here to provide fun activities like: the Ring Toss Drinking Game, 8-Bit scavenger hunt adventure, climbing up our two story Thirst Aid Tree House Bar, dream interpretation, painting on our art wall, playing spin the giant bottle, yoga, meditation, improv jam, poetry, performing in our annual Talent Show, dancing the night away at our Sexy Fancy Dancy Party, making out with that special camper, campfire stories, giant marshmallow S’Mores, or if you just want to chill, we have hammocks, hand misters, a comfy couch and a pillow tent, all for you to have the best Summer Camp of your life!

name: Sun Guardians
description: A spiritual temple honoring Hanuman: "House of Tea and Yoga" taking you on a journey of your past, present and future. Your soul is timeless and our space is awesome.

name: SUNSET LOUNGE
description: None

name: Sunset Portal
description: The best place to watch the sunset on the playa. Come join burners to say thanks for another great day and welcome whatever mysteries the night may bring

name: Super Friends Synaesthesia
description: Billowing white fabric surrounds our waterless pillow pools where the tired burner can take an afternoon nap. Learn new skills at one of our daytime workshops or groove to some tunes. My hand is holding your hand, but we're such Super Friends, you feel my hand on your heart...or in your brain.

name: Suspended Animation
description: Experience full-suspension erotic rope bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers offers bondage and BDSM rides, workshops for all levels, breathtaking performances, and night time play parties. We also rove the playa and build impromptu bondage sculpture!

name: SwagMart
description: SwagMart is an Oasis of creativity located in the heart of the Black Rock Desert. Our Swag Pins, Earrings, Necklaces, Patches, Post Cards are collected and cherished each year while our nightly Branding of your Belts, Boots, Hats, etc are a must have of the Playa. Special Swag and Trophies for our Costume Appreciation . Stop by for a creative fun positive experience and meet Burners from all over the Planet. SwagMart Celebrating out 7th Year.Always close to Center Camp.

name: Swamp Fuckits
description: Motley krewe of New Orleans creatives, lovers, dancers, djs, artists and friends- expert at bringing our laissez les bons temps rouler attitudes from the swamp to the desert.  Come meet us!

name: Sweet Spot, The
description: None

name: Swing City
description: Swing City brings the vibe from the Original Muscle Beach in Santa Monica California to Black Rock City.

name: Swish Embassy
description:
The Swish Embassy. 
Themed extravaganzas costumes encouraged.

name: Synapse Conduit
description: Synapse Conduit is a place where you will interact with a number of Burners who will tell your fortune, read your tarot,  play mind games and interact in a fun and silly manner. Our goal is to help you relax, discuss the hip happenings of life and the playa and ensure you leave with a smile somewhere on your body.

name: Syncytium
description:
Syncytium is an incubator, open to all who want to PLAY, we create beautiful experiences for others and ourselves.  We follow the burning man 
ethos, and we also believe in ACTIVE PARTICIPATION in our camp.

name: Taiwanderlust
description:
Come on join us and get heart with us!
Come to night market and you will fun with sexy betel nut girls and hot Taiwan sausage! 
Can you imagine a goddess, Empress of Sea, Mazu, show up in Burning Man?! Come to see and welcome to join us! 
We love to share Taiwan temple culture with you at workshop.

name: TAKOE
description: We are  a mobile kindergarten for Your inner children.

name: Tango'd Up In Blues
description: Discover what it's like to hold a partner in your arms and move to the music.  Tango. Blues Dance.  Join us in re-popularizing partner dance in America.

name: TaoSynergy
description: None

name: Tar Pits
description: At the Tar Pits, take a load off in our dinosaur themed camp.  Come by to say hi to Tracy Crea Tops! We will be playing old stop animation dinosaur movies in our hammock chill area nightly.

name: Tarwater
description: Tarwater, home of the Rat Taxi, returns with The Tarry Night Bowl, the Ladder Toss game and the inaptly named Corn Hole game.   Have your fortune told in the Hit or Miss Fortune Booth.  You can pick out clothes at Lady S’ Boutique where you don’t have to do anything in exchange.  The Labyrinth will be lit for your nocturnal wanderings.

name: Tasty
description: Tasty. Serving up beats and eats since 2005.

name: Tasty Noodles
description: Stop by Tasty Noodles in the afternoon for beer, dancing, and shade. Bounce on our trampoline, swing on our swing set, and paint a picture in the Noodle Doodle Dome!

name: Tautology
description: Tautology is an arts collective of mathematicians and scientists.

name: Tazii
description: Come chill in Tazii's lush Moroccan festival tent!  While you're at it, get a drink our three from our top shelf octo-bar.

name: TBD
description: Camp TBD hopes to serve as both a welcome wagon for new participants as well as a portal to inner visions for long-time participants. Our camp has been around for a couple of incarnations and each year our desire to enmesh with the 10 Principles grows deeper and rapturous. We have the slobbery enthusiasm of a young puppy paired with the obsessive compulsivity of a head nun.

name: Tectonic
description: Come bask in the shade of our fire spewing volcano, or dance to our ground-shaking beats while we serve you a tec n' tonic.  Don't forget to bring us your playa virgins to sacrifice to the volcano gods!

name: Teddies on Teddys
description: Take a slide down into the teddy bear pit!

name: Temple Guardians Camp
description:
The mission of the Temple Guardians is: To hold the space of the Temple, maintaining an environment that allows equal access for everyone to have the experience and expression that they need, and keep the Temple itself, as well as the participants who visit it, safe.

The mission of the Temple Guardians Camp is to hold space for and to serve the Temple Guardians. We do this by creating a warm and welcoming place for Guardians and potential Guardians to gather. We host the training sessions and social events. And as the experience of being a Guardian can be powerful and overwhelming, our camp is a place for them to find a compassionate ear and a knowing Heart.

name: Temple of Anointment
description: If your hide is suffering from the ravages of the dry dusty and high solar radiation climate of the playa, come to the Temple so we may anoint you with our healing skin care formulas that you may rise again to fully enjoy all the experiences the playa offers, and without playa foot! Don't forget to take back to your camp and friends a tube or two of our Don't Burn, Man! Organic SPF 35 Zinc Oxide Sunscreen, so you can remain protected while out exploring the Carnival. (And if you really wish to, you can use Don't Burn, Man! Sunscreen to mime it up!)

name: Temple of Fluff
description: Temple of Fluff is a place designed to be as comfortable as feasibly possible. Come explore the possibilities of comfort in a dome completely full of soft things to lay on. When in doubt, stretch out; all places are your places.

name: Temple O'Flying Spaghetti Monster
description: We are a comfortable neighborhood pub with a rockin' attitude. In honor of his noodley goodness the Friendly Fire Bar will administer ice cold libations and groovin’ tunes for your mind, body and spirit. Take a ride 3 stories up in the Sky Lounge and view the Playa with a much higher perspective. Call almost anywhere in the world on our free public phone or use our free wi-fi hotspot. The Flying Spaghetti Monster welcomes all, so stop by and be touched by his noodly appendage.

name: Tender Heckles Porch
description: 'Oops you dropped your smile...' come find it at Tender Heckles Porch.

name: Termination Dust Hole
description: We are a collective of artists, musicians, freaks, hecklers, and performers, hailing down from Alaska to meet, greet and eat all of you.

name: Tetrix Village
description: A fractal world of excitement. Bringing together the resources of several camps to deliver a fusion of insightful and playful experiences to further the mind of the burner. This year we bring you the Armone Galaxy 100ft Maze, Camp Meow Illuminated Environments, a host of bands, improv activities, sno-cone hours, silk acrobatics, healing yurt and much more fun.

name: That Camp Over There
description: Providing Caffeine in the morning, Drinking in the afternoon and Glowing in the dark. Moon the Man from our scaffold.

name: The Absolem Lounge
description: None

name: the black hole
description: The Black Hole. Staff camp for the Black Rock City Department of Gate, Perimeter and Exodus

name: The Blight
description: The Blight—bringing you fine refreshments and high nerdy discourse since 2008. Join us each evening for a salon, and Thursday night for our high formal Blight Cocktail Party.

name: The Boot Camp
description: The Boot Camp (by Farrah and Chris)

name: The Breakfast Club
description: The Breakfast Club provides Coffee and Pancakes for the community from 9am to 1pm. Scarbutts Coffee serves fresh brewed coffee. Pancake Playhouse serves up hot pancakes. With our steampunk Airship  Airpusher, we deliver sweet music to the masses.

name: The Disco Parlour
description:
The Disco Parlour is a space that inspires, entertains, and energizes as you travel on your dessert quest.  Join us in the Barn for a daytime disco.  Create your costume additions, paint your body, enjoy a cold beverage, or dance under the water mister.  Climb through our dome to challenge your body and mind.  Rock on the see-saw to find your inner adult child!  Dance under the disco ball under your head is spinning!

Inspire // Create // Enjoy!

name: The Dreamaginatorium
description: The Dreamaginatorium aims to foster a sense of wonder, joy and excitement. We create a space and energy of play, exploration and creativity that helps people get in touch with their deepest dreams, hopes and desires, and inspires them to follow their heart and pursue these dreams. We do this primarily through sublime art and participatory, improvisational performance that induces heart and mind opening experiences to remind people of the magic all around them, and inside themselves.

name: The Dump
description: Where the worlds most fabulous musicians and dancers from MarchFourth Marching Band, The Saloon Ensemble, Love-Bomb Go-Go Marching Band, Trashcan Joe, and The Ukeladies are dumped and recycled to endlessly create music from a by-gone era.  Come sing, dance, play our piano, and join-in as we all share in electronic-free acoustic joy! Lyrics included!

name: The Dusty Rhino Camp
description: The Dusty Rhino Camp aspires to bring people together through art, fire and electronic music, and to be the best Black Rock public transportation possible!! While people take an "art safari” they listen to great DJ’s and enjoy a 29’ Rhino that shoots fire from its horn.

name: The Elephant
description: Welcome to the house of The Elephant.

name: The Embassy
description: The Embassy is the center for relations between Black Rock City and the Default World. Come by to ease into life as a burner, learn about the strange customs of the Default World, and prepare for inter-world travel.

name: The Enclave
description: The Enclave brings those with deep BurningMan roots while providing room for a cast of new tendrils. We are united by a passion for art, design, performance and self-depricating behavior. The Enclave brings a spicy hot mess of Playastani charm to the 9's of Black Rock by celebrating the civically-minded gifts, we have to offer, in a format that intends to suspend and expand our visitor’s expectations

name: The Fun Fur Traders of Black Rock
description: Where does fun fur come from? Come and visit the Fun Fur Traders of Black Rock and learn the story behind the fur! Help us celebrate, as we spread cheer through song, dance, and drink - guests of the Fun Fur Traders will be immersed in the culture of the fun fur trade, and a re-imagined era of exploration and discovery.

name: The G-Spot
description: None

name: The Hangry Bishop
description: The Hangry Bishop serves up tasty meals in a festive, communal dining hall.  Come prepared to mingle while enjoying a Grilled Cheesus sandwich. Comes with a side of Guilt.

name: The Hive
description: A buzzing mass of madness from the East descends upon the desert, full of burning light and energy. Is the Hive full of honey, or stings? Bathe in our glow, and discover!

name: The Hookah Lounge
description: Come to the Hookah Lounge and enjoy our flavored tobaccos, coffee, and wide selection of teas. Our Moroccan style lounge serves up shisha filtered through juice and water every night. The plush seating, soft carpeting, and great people make this the ultimate Burning Man chill-out zone. If you have a favorite molasses based tobacco, you are welcome to bring it and share with others.

name: The Institute Village
description: The Institute Village -- Explore the True Frontier through innovations in science, technology, negotiations, and propoganda. When you are on the edge of a system, find your way to our network saloon and reformat your hard drive while having a randy good time. With daily installments and upgrades, be ready to expand your world.

name: The Living Room
description: August 26, 2013: A terrestrial being in the form of a cheese pizza visits us at camp and requests that we share our experiences and makes our camp public. Not wanting to piss off the being, we began planning our theme camp. Back again as The Living Room. BYOSP (Bring Your Own Summer Punch).

name: The Lost Boys
description: The Lost boys is a fun interactive camp where you can come for an event like Naked bacon and stay and hang out for hours.

name: The Lost Penguin
description: What could be more lost than a Penguin in the desert? Drop in to our hospitality oasis where we offer comforts such as shade, couches, wine, lemonade, chocolate, snow cones, friendly people, and live entertainment.  Day or night, get up on stage for asshole theatre, watch some bands, dance to DJs or take a workshop. Join us as we navigate surpirses all week!  Or just sit and we will engage you in conversation as you watch the playa float by.

name: The Love Muscle
description:
My World, My Rules

https://www.facebook.com/groups/189548531179275/

name: The Mask Factory
description: The Mask Factory Camp is the supply base and residential base for a portion of the artists from all over the world, that will operate The Mask Factory.

name: Theme Camp Theme Camp
description: A bar with ever changing themes and tasty libations and games to match!

name: The Mine
description: We are art support camp for Anton Viditz-Wards art installations, this years project is called "Reflections of a Fire Sprite".

name: the ministry of douchebaggery!
description: None

name: The Neighbourhood
description:
We are a Québec/US Burning Man theme camp! Together we create a communal space that celebrates the childlike mastery of the art of play.

  So come to The Neighborhood, where it's Recess all day! Dance, drink and play your cares away. 

You can swing on our swings and slide down our slide, from our super dank bar, you simply can't hide.

Come dance to some beats, no need to be discreet, we got your back covered from this whimsical heat.

Whether noontime or nighttime, leisure or labor, do us a favor...Won't you be our neighbor?

name: The New Barbarians
description: The New Barbarians and their band of human-sized dinosaurs are led by their massive, Tyrannosaurus-like steel ruler, Jurassic Pork, on its quest to spread its bountiful stock of barbecued flesh taken from pastured hogs.  The only hope for the few remaining survivors living amongst the playa is to join a never-ending feast suitable for King Horik himself as we share amongst the generosity of our humble leader, JP, and amalgamate ever closer to becoming one.

name: The PaddyWagon Docking Station
description: None

name: The Phage
description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth's living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. In their furious co-optive radiations they have acted as the vital genetic pollinators that wove long-separated lines of cellular life into resplendent new threads -- the phage are the needles of life's tapestry. Beware if you encounter us: memetic biohazards lie ahead.

name: The Reincarnation Location
description:
Leave the default world behind and be reborn into the world of the Playa.

First confess your sins, then spin the Wheel of Penance.   Whatever it lands on you must do, but you'll get to choose a G, R or NC-17 rated version.  Once your penance is completed, you'll rid yourself of all your worldly belongings (temporarily), and from within the giant pregnant belly (our Dome) you'll crawl out through a 6' vagina to be reborn - where someone in hospital scrubs will spank you and give you a rebirth certificate (laminated) with your Playa Name and thumbprint.

name: The Rising Arms Pub
description: Your friendly, local, international watering hole and second home on the playa returns for a sixth year. Stop by to wet your whistle, just take care not to trip over the folks passed out on the floor, and if you want a quiet pint, be sure to pop in before sunset, after which it gets slightly raucous.  If you've had enough of bars then give a pub a go. Stop by for much libations and games.

name: The Secret Gentlemen's Club
description:
The Secret Gentlemen's Club will bring culture and refinement to this savage land. The Secret Gentlemen's Club is a space in which a person, be they commoner or king, can be the best version of themselves. The Secret Gentlemen's Club could use a stiff drink, and knows how to mix it...well. The Secret Gentlemen's Club practices expert gamesmanship. The Secret Gentlemen's Club counts among its members both men and women (because, of course, women can be the most secret gentlemen of all). The Secret Gentlemen's Club reminds you that proper attire is required (or will be provided).
The Secret Gentlemen's Club: Just Fucking Dandy

name: The Space Baggers
description:
Our big ass board games bring all the burners to The Yard, and
they’re like, “Hey, this is pretty fun.” Come for the games, stay to get schooled in DJing, juggling, and the fine art of hula hoop.
Don’t worry we’ll make time for recess.

name: The Steam Bath Project
description: The Steam Bath Project makes the mundane magical! The simple act of “cleansing” becomes part of an age-old  ritual tradition embracing the possibility of transformation. We invite you into the geodesic dome where you can relax on the wooden benches as boiling water produces steam with negative ions that fill the space. Negative ions are known to create an overall feeling of wellness, similar to the air after a summer thunderstorm.

name: The Sunset Trip
description: The Sunset Trip is a mashup of 3 Los Angeles based camps with a concurrent theme of getting together and throwing epic parties. We are all vastly different in what we provide to the world, yet share the same values and deep rooted awesomeness that bring us together year after year. We bring the Dirty, Sparkle and BOOM.

name: The Tea Camp
description: Tea camp is the sister camp to Camp Bao Chicka Wow Wow and is honored to provide the Playa with thousands of cups of Tea of all varieties both hot and cold! Come share pork buns from our sister camp while you enjoy a relaxing ambiance. We look forward to sharing a cup of tea with you!

name: The Universe
description:
Scientists are shocked to discover that The Universe is largely composed, not of "empty space" as previously thought, but rather downtempo music, cuddly pillows and pretty lights. 

Come cross "explored the totality of existence" off your list, you can go pretty damn far without ever leaving your comfy beanbag chair.

name: The Yogi Bears
description: DJ guided yoga with the Yogi Bears! Daily DJ guided yoga, tea offerings and an occasional dance party at night.

name: The Zoo
description: None

name: Things That Swing
description: Bring your things! Put them on a porch bench, in a hammock, at the end of a rope. Join us for scheduled events including Social Grooming and Impact Play. You're always welcome to stop in cuz that's how we swing.

name: Third Space Place
description: Third Space Place (3SP), located in Home Rule Village, celebrates “third spaces” – social, relaxing locations that offer a sense of place beyond the two usual environments of home (“first space”) and work (“second space”).  A true “third space,” 3SP’s comfortable retreat will offer shaded conversations throughout the day, warm fireside chats at night, and interactive events that 3SP hopes will entice our Black Rock City community to stop by, have a chat, and Participate!

name: This is You
description: Experience your own personalized scavenger hunt; Let our ‘Reflection Passport” guide you on your way to fascinating points of interest on the playa by seeking out adventure, and recording your reflections.  Return to share stories with our Reflection Specialists, ponder your reflection in our 3D photo booth and lounge under our flame art installation “Brood”.

name: (T-HOOP)Turtles&HumansOutOfPlace
description: LunaCity Art Support Camp of HumansOutOfPlace & Turtle Time bring you Tavern Hopper Art Car, BYOB Bar, and Shades of Delight. Come chill with us in the shade after a long day of takin' care of art!

name: Thumper
description: A sound camp for things that go THUMP in the night.  A stimulating sunset communal dance party where intimacy isn't sacrificed for sound.

name: Tiki Hammock camp
description: Tiki Hammock Camp - Have a drink and relax in our climbable hammock art, meet and visit with other awesome burners!

name: Time Colony
description: None

name: Time Ninja Syndicate
description: I know you’re confused, it’s OK, we can help you remember. We don’t have much time. The temporal rift is unstable and won’t remain open much longer.

name: Time To Burn
description: Taking over your devices, we help mirror your hopes and dreams on the Playa.

name: Titicaca
description: Ah... delightful Lake Titicaca, high in the Andes Mountains, and with such an interesting name with so many meanings.  Come frolic!

name: TITTIES & PANCAKES MADNESS MUSEUM
description: We have pancakes in the shape of animals, titties in the shape of titties, robotic creeptures, gaffs like the Fiji mermaid, reports of a live freakshow, mutated taxidermy/dried parts CHECK, body paint in the shape of mud CHECK two headed baby CHECK and now introducing... pancakes in the shape of titties!! Oh and did we mention DUTTCH? Come by and check in with RATS and DIANE!! New to DITCH? Everyone has to start somewhere. Nothing is what it seems, everyone is mad and the tea parties get you smashed.

name: Tokyo
description: None

name: ToneAge - CARNivAL PLEASURES
description: ToneAge - CARNivAL PLEASURES, a great mix of new and old alike, primarily from Vancouver, Denver and San Francisco, but always happy to see and welcome new participants from wherever they call home.

name: TortoiseTown
description: TortoiseTown is an International Village comprised of people of all races, ages, and lifestyles.

name: Totem of Confessions
description: Totem of Confessions.  We support art!

name: Totenkitten
description: Totenkitten is a fascist demagoguery devoted to crushing all opposition and imposing our will on the masses; initially conceived as a reaction to the decadent weakness of other organizations, Totenkitten quickly took on a life of its own.

name: Toxic Disco Clam
description: The real toxic disco clam is an aquatic creature that attracts prey with its lighted exterior and then immobilizes them with acidic snot. We're... pretty much the same: dazzling lights, draw you in, ply you with our intoxicating beverages (significantly less snot).

name: Tranquility Bass' Lunar Carnival
description: None

name: Trashistan
description: The Rant O Matic returns in its mobile glory, available to all city members who need to let off steam by ranting after those rough moments on and off the playa. We will also be host to the Anti Zen Movement, providing Anti Zen meditation daily, tomorrow at sunset. BE THERE THEN!

name: Trifucta
description: Trifucta was born after three people in separate RV’s decided to create community space by parking them in the shape of a triangle. From that small act, a community comprised of artists, builders, fashion designers and welders joined together to create connectivity through a common space that engages the playful creativity and expression inside each participant.

name: Triptych
description: Triptych welcomes all aficionados of art, music, food, and drink to dance the night and day away, enjoy some tasty treats, and bask in the glow of the Treasures and Grace (a collaboration with Disorderly Vandals).  Stop by throughout the week to enjoy some entertainment, learn something new, or simply relax in one of our cozy lounge spaces.

name: Tropical Treehouse
description: A verdant home alive with the warmth of aloha!  Castaways welcomed to paddle up to the tiki lights and toast the night with a Mai Thai.

name: TSUNAMI CAMP
description: Stop by Tsunami Camp for a frosty snow cone, a Playa Fashion Makeover, a live performance, or just to make new friends!

name: Turkey Camp
description: What key has two legs, two wings and can't open doors? A Turkey, that's right, welcome to Turkey Camp (it's not a typo).

name: Tutu Camp
description: Tutu Camp is your one stop tutu shop. We offer a variety of tutu related activities, along with raw tutu materials and an interactive Tulle Forest.

name: Twilight Spaghetti Theatre
description: Perform for your chance to slurp our hot wet noodles. This is your chance to show off your under-appreciated talents on our custom built stage for a spaghetti dinner!

name: Twisted G Spot
description: Loosely knit group of burners offer for your pleasure the Twisted G Spot Bar serving up PVD's (Playa Vodka Drinks) w/ mostly organic fruit juices.  (Bring mixers if you can)  Dudeist Priest available in his playa confessional "Penance is Hell", two ordained burners available to marry you and then marry you again if you so desire. DJ N8Tron spinning dance party music. Otter Pops upon request - both cold and hard and early morning powdered donuts, that's not just playa dust,  delivered by Kristi Kreams on a silver platter at 8:30 am Thursday through Monday. Glasses cleaned, both eye and drinking and massages given or taken when the table is up! Look for schedule in the Twisted G Mailbox on playa.

name: Twisted Swan
description:
Stop in for a cold draught beer, fine Irish whiskey, hot Irish coffee, and wonderful Celtic music. Recite a limerick and get a Guinness, get your 
Who on at our Doctor Who night or show your best knees on Kilted Thursday, and thrill to our music seisiun featuring the playa's finest celtic musicians!

name: Twisted Tentacles
description:
Tahoe Twisted and Octopus Garden present Twisted Tentacles Village.  Welcome to Twisted Tentacles, a village of aquatic tomfoolery. Under the sea, you will dive into the Octopus Garden where you’ll fall in love with each of the great mollusc’s three hearts and be enveloped by its eight inky arms; on land you’ll join the DJ-mixed-up crew of the Twisted Yacht Club where loose lips never sink ships; and with the Christina you will sail out into the deep, deep playa to catch a glimpse of our dazzling art anemone. 

We believe that the audio and visual arts have the ability to reach the minds, souls, and hearts of any observer, turning all merry mariners into participants. 

Above and below sea level, on dry land and in choppy water, this village will be swimming in a pool of creativity and inspiration.

name: Twisted Yacht Club
description:
Come party with the DJ-mixed-up crew of the Twisted Yacht Club where loose lips never sink ships. We'll be hosting
a Plank Walking Pirate Party and Motor Boat Contest where raunchy mariners are encouraged to wear their best hello sailor outfits. Come sail with us!

name: Two Lanterns
description: Best weddings on playa, Unofficial Playa Civil Unions (incl. rings/certificate), Black Rock Temporary Divorce, Annulments, an: interactive elwire sculpture and Joslyn's Little House of Oral Delights

name: Two-Stroke Transit
description: Got questions about your two-stroke engine?  Maybe you just like to rev up your engine and make a lot of noise?  Then stop by Two-Stroke Transit to talk to us.  While here, you can find out how to prevent playa damage from dripping oil while improve the general function and environmental friendliness of your motor.

name: TYGER TYGER!
description: Tyger Tyger! We wish to assemble a society of adventurers and create a creative and artistic outpost, to act as an oasis of trade, entertainment, and cultural expression.

name: U.F.O.
description: U.F.O. What is that? U Figure it Out…..

name: Uhuru
description: Come to Uhuru for soul nourishment at our desert oasis, the Dream Tea Lounge. Explore your dreams with other weary travelers looking to rest their feet and expand their minds. Climb our Sky Tipi for an adventure, and look for our Dream Catcher marking the entrance to our camp! For those among us seeking connection to past, present, and future, visit our Dream Ateliers and walk away with a piece of our history. Welcome!

name: Uli Baba and the Horny Thieves
description: O illustrious merchants of the flesh and pillagers of the wealth of man. Our glorious master, Uli Baba, he who is magnificent and just, commands your presence at his Slave Auctions, Belly Dance Exhibition, and other debauched and glorious events.

name: Ultimate Celebration
description: The end is nigh! Come bounce while you can in the upholstered luxury of our Bungee Couch Garden, sip the ambrosia of perpetual motion (champagne and 5-hour energy, the official libation of our Ultimate Celebration, available from 4-6pm daily), contemplate your own ultimate destination, wipe your filthy face with a hot towel, join in a campfire sing-along, or zip around on a Wiimote-controlled electric armchair. In short, if your vision of the apocalypse is as lazy and carefree as ours, we've got you covered!

name: Unholy Cupcake Brigade
description: UCB would like to invite you in for tea and cupcakes! A nice place to chill, great conversation and even some easy games to beat your friends at!

name: Uniclan Presents: Carnie Cult
description: Carnie Cult is a fantastic gypsy band of quirky characters - heckling peddlers, fortune tellers, eccentric inventors, wizards, riveters, and talented freaks and beauties from far-away lands, led to Black Rock City by their mysterious leader, Margaret. Come have your fortune read, create your own sideshow, or burn your money in our decommodi-fire!

name: Universe University
description: Universe University "We put the U in yoU". Come chill with some creative characters and participate in some imaginative activities all while celebrating this beautiful universe and our shared place in it.

name: Unnecessarily High Five
description: Come by and try your luck at the Unnecessarily High Five. Bring friends, bring your robot helper, bring a trampoline and fling yourself into the history books.

name: Vagabonds and Tagalongs
description: A camp for lost and wayward travelers.

name: Valhalla
description: Valhalla is a home for the weary in Victory and Defeat, a 24/7 community place to rest, recover, and regroup. Come and share your stories. Leave and make more.

name: Valhalla on the Playa
description: Valhalla On The Playa, a Norse idea of heaven, we will be a place to take off the armor of life and begin to slip into the beginnings of afterlife. Our drinks will be cold, our men and woman lithe and cheerful, as we are all guided to our final resting place in our shady comfortable lounge.

name: Vamp Camp
description: A long time tradition of Vamp juice, music, burn barrel and if deserved, a Vamp stamp! We only come out at night. (Unless we wake up early!) No schedules, no commitments. If you are here, you are on time!

name: Vegan Nightmare Camp
description: An interactive environment to discuss sustainable farming, healthy diets, local food sourcing and global views on the future of meat production advantages & disadvantages.  It's also a fun place with the "Wheel O Meat" and lively discussions and drinks.

name: Venus Lift - Mega Mikoshi - Japan
description: "Venus lift" is a portable shrine from Japan. Come play with our musical parade at Midway. We need "Venus" and worshiping lifters. WASSHOY!!!

name: Videogasm
description: Black Rock City's Playa Theater since 1998! Nightly video screenings on our two big screens. Body painting every afternoon in our shade structure. Come by and cool off in our mister! Play with our smoke ring cannons and over-sized games. Adult Hoppity Hop races every afternoon in our courtyard! Record a message in our Burning Man video comment booth then watch it later on our screens. Play Playa Jeopardy on Wednesday night. Live Rocky Horror Picture Show on Friday night! Home of The 48 Hour Film Project BRC. Contact us if you have an original video you'd like to show. Located in Snowflake Village.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience
description: Are you hot and thirsty on the playa? Come to VICE for refreshing, hand-made Vietnamese Iced Coffee, afternoons from 2pm to 4pm. Mix and mingle with friends and neighbors! Make new friends! Make new neighbors! Update your Flamebook status while waiting. Get your Beard pampered, learn to walk on Stilts, dance with Silk-Poi Flags, or create Perler Bead keepsakes at one of our interactive workshops. VICE is a friendly, diverse camp who wants to see YOU in line for coffee!

name: Vines Without Borders
description: Vines Without Borders is an international wine bar and lounge serving fine wine from around the world nightly. Starting at sunset a different wine region will be celebrated in our cool LED illuminated venue furnished with vintage couches and chairs and a 16' back-lit bar.

name: Vinyl Bunker
description: Ice cold hard lemonade, lawn games, and 50s music. Come relax in our front yard from 11 AM to 3 PM daily.

name: Virgin Hooper Camp
