description: Can't keep it up? Want to learn how to hoop or master new tricks? Visit Virgin Hooper Camp. We have a 99.7% success rate in teaching hula hooping.

name: Vomiting Sparrows
description: Come have some laughs with the Sparrows! Chirp Chirp Blarf!

name: Voodoo Shooting Gallery
description: Exercise your demons at Voodoo Shooting Gallery by taking aim at voodoo dolls and shrunken heads to win a 16oz glow cup decorated with VSG 2015 camp logo. French voodoo priestesses & their wicked minions host the gallery, Zombie Lounge, Nude Direction Bar and Satan’s Fire Table, a veritable wasteland of stupid good fun to exorcise you, butt better.

name: VooDoo Soup
description: Hot soup, live music,homebrewed sodas. Sousaphones welcome.

name: Voted Best Camp
description: Come get schooled by a bunch of busted down punk rockers who are smarter, funnier, and better looking than yourself. Each with one foot in their graves, they will show you how to do fucking Burning Man.  Skateboarding? Check. Live Rock and Roll played on ACTUAL instruments? Check. Booze? Check. This is the unbreakable magic triangle that has defended the city against electronic misery and drug induced delusion since 2005. The rumors are true. Now come see it for yourselves.

name: VR Camp
description: VR Camp is bringing an amazing array of the latest Virtual Reality Experiences to Black Rock City for the first time in 2015!  Whether you're dancing with a 20' lizard, teleporting across the planet to different exotic places or seeing through someone else's eyes - just be prepared to have your mind blown.

name: V-Spot
description:
The V-SPoT is Burning Man’s official Volunteer Headquarters in Black Rock City. Where different projects come to seek Volunteers and where Burners come to find out how to help. Our friendly Volunteer Experts are here to answer your questions and help you find your “special place” on the Playa.
http://www.burningman.com/participate/vrteam.html

name: Vulcan Empire
description: Every day, Monday through Friday, Vulcan Empire will be hosting workshops related to the flow arts, dancing, and body movement. There will be games, fun and a lot of learning. We will be hosting spinners from all of the world that are coming to teach you anything you would like to know in their respective fields.

name: VW Bus Camp
description: Experience VW Bus Camp's twisted take on Carnival of Mirrors by participating in the distorted 1960's spectacle that our VW Buses now represent. Take in our Leopard Lounge and Day Spa, carnival booths and games, Grateful Dyed tie dye party, lectures on trippy subjects including VW repair and maintenance, thoughts on the dead french philosophers and take part in our silly effort to reimagine the '60s and contemplation of the safety of Lawn Jarts!

name: vyvn
description: Vyvn is a NYC-based camp that focuses on intimacy and good vibes.

name: WABI SABI
description: None

name: Walkover
description: Come on by, get stamped and see what else we have to offer.

name: Wanderer's Camp
description: Our Camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, ice cold Gin/Tonic's, and Hot Dogs,  Come by every afternoon for a hot dog or veggie dog, a gin/tonic and enjoy the shade, great company and music.

name: Weiner Zoo and Pussy Aquarium
description: The Weiner Zoo and Pussy Aquarium is a camp of men and woman who aren't afraid to let their inner animal out. We love to play with balls, rings and monkey around, we also love to show new friends how much fun we have at the zoo. Come by the snack bar at 3 every day for a grilled hot, to play games with us and relax. Some of our animals are very active and like yoga in the mornings, some like to play in the hot sun and some are nocturnal and will be out all night, so come by anytime to join in the fun.

name: Well Actually...
description: None

name: Well Made Mistakes
description: Mistakes were made here

name: WeScream
description: Camp WeScream plans to serve ice cream to all who wander by, lost or not.  We invite people to relax in our shade, churn some old-fashioned hand-cranked ice cream, hang out, and interact with us and others.  We expect the lure of cold ice cream in the hot desert afternoon to sing its siren song to return people to a time where a community would gather together to provide for all.

name: Wet Dreams
description: Facilitating the wettest dreams on the playa - come lucid dream with us. Villaging with the prestigious Shangrilawless crew!

name: Wetspot
description: The WetSpot Bar & Faceplant Lounge: Welcome to the best place on the playa to enjoy a craft brew or SNG while relaxing in our unique lounge. WetSpot is about making new friends in an open to all setting while engaging in musings around one of our favorite pastimes: consuming libations. Our crew includes homebrewers and non-homebrewers alike and provides an inviting atmosphere to sample one of our concoctions as well as just having fun.

name: We Want To Learn Camp
description: Home of the student designers and builders of 3 art pieces at Burning Man 2015 funded by the Burning Man Organisation. Bizmuth Bivouac, Reflection and Infinity Tree, the students from Westminster University in London are led by their professors Toby Burgess and Arthur Mamou Mani.

name: What Would Duck Tape Do?
description: What Would Duct Tape Do? Helping our community members keep their cargo in good repair! We will instruct and assist people on useful playa fixes using duct tape in innovative and creative ways to repair, strengthen and create!

name: What Would You Do For A Pickle?
description: None

name: Where Da Lady?
description: Shaved ice during the hottest part of the day!

name: Where's The Killer Party? Camp
description: We will be offering a bar, fun photobooth, and events all week long.  Come visit us- we'll show you a good time and, of course, a killer party!

name: White Bronco
description:
White Bronco craves the connectivity, honesty, and safety that we get at Burningman. It is important to us that our home away from home remains a welcoming and supportive environment. Check out our schedule for dancing and massages.

We are looking for new 'cult' members or recruits to help out with DJing, physical art, interactivity, and live music. We want newcomers to know that if they have any of the skillsets that we need, they are more than welcome to come and showcase their skills as much as they want.

name: White Ocean
description: White Ocean, building a community that offers a gathering place for individuals who appreciate stimulating sound, art, and design.

name: White Trash Superstars
description: Come Party with us like a Superstar, we are your neighborhood dive bar, complete with games.  This is our vacation too so our bartenders are not always on their best behavior, which makes everything so much more fun!!! Besides drinks they serve anything from love to snarky attitude, so you never know what you are going to get.  Sometimes drinks are gifted, sometimes they are bartered; but never sold!!! So leave your $$ in your tent!

name: WickedLand
description:
Have you ever wondered what happened to your childhood fairytale heroes after you left their lands? WICKEDLAND brings you face-to-face with them: all grown up, distorted and oh-so-very twisted. How have you changed? What fairytale archetypes do you still carry inside of you? We'll help you find out – come play, there are no spectators here!
 
WICKEDLAND brings your favorite childhood fairytale heroes and their archetypal stories back to life. But something has changed – this world isn't nearly as innocent as it was when you were younger, because you are it.
 
Climb up the castle towers that adorn the entrance to our camp. If you want to dig deeper through the world of twisted fairytales, you are welcome to sit with a book in our cozy lounge. But be warned – a transformation lingers behind every page you turn. If you're not careful, you may leave WICKEDLAND as Gay Donald Duck or Nymphomaniac Snow White.

name: Winner Winner Chicken Dinner
description: Everyone’s a winner; you get chicken dinner. Want drumsticks and beer? You can find them here!

name: Wish Maker Camp
description: Come visit us at Wish Maker!  From 3pm-6pm daily.  We provide you a plethora of burnable materials and the tools to create your own meaningful tribute or object of devotion.  Our talented table dwellers will help you create something that is worthy of its meaning to you, friend.  Our wishing ribbons will be available always for your wishes leave them on our wall and we will deliver to the temple for you at sunrise on Sunday before the burn.  Please join us!

name: Witte's End BRC Outpost
description: None

name: Wizard Depot
description: Wizard Depot: Serving you since the Third Crimson Solstice. Wizard Depot is your one-stop shop for all your wizard needs including magical scrolls, fortune tellers, elixirs, arcane knowledge and games.

name: WMICC Organic Fruit / Veggie Bar
description: Offering the freshest and juiciest organic produce on the playa since 2011. Come by for a visit, your body with thank you!

name: Wonder Camp
description: "Wonder Camp" is where we fix the broken burner and all their stuff. You can also get your tee shirt silk screened at "Splinter the Printer" and your attitude adjusted at the "Siren Salon"!

name: Wonderlust Arcade Cast & Crew
description: None

name: Wonder Whoasis
description: Wonder Whoasis: Come put your "heads in the clouds", stop being grounded to reality & be free to imagine the unimaginable in a cloud out on the playa. It'll be an airy, bright, soft, freeing space with white shag carpets, white fluffy pillows, refreshing mist that provides an oasis under the hot sun during the day & lightening storms to illuminate the dark night sky.

name: Woop Woop
description: None

name: Wulf Den
description: The Wulf Den is where you can come heal your mind and body in the morning, then ruin it again in the evening! Come Dance in the shade to our groovy beats, and craft a wulf cock in our lounge area

name: Xanadu
description: )'(anadu...A Vision in a Dream, expressed through strokes of a brush on an endless canvas.  Participate in self-expression through Art with a goal of inspiring other individuals to live life in a way that tests comfort and convention.

name: X-Factor (machinedom)
description: See the 60 ft lighted Hypnotic Swirl - - Stop by for a beverage - -

name: XONR8
description: None

name: xXx Ardent Heavy Industries xXx
description: Ardent Heavy Industries and its fire arts division Interpretive Arson's support camp for 2πr (part of the Charnival) and new project straightedge coming to Burning Man 2015.

name: Yabba Dabba Do Me
description: We are a fun interactive camp, featuring a plaything made from a combination of a trampoline, a metal frame dome, and 1500' of bungee cords. Every action has a reaction, every motion has an emotion.

name: Yard, The
description: Our big ass board games bring all the burners to the yard, and they’re like, “hey, this is pretty fun.” Come for the games, stay to get schooled in DJing, juggling, and the fine art of hula hoop. Don’t worry, we’ll make time for recess.

name: Yayflags Care-nival!
description: Snacks Snack Snacks! We are passionate about merging optimal snacking with maximum party, come by our camp to indulge in our healthy secrets, groovy beats, and be showered with snack related gifts! All dietary restrictions welcome!

name: Yellow Bike Shop
description: Black Rock Community Transit runs and operates the Yellow Bike Program. The Yellow Bikes are community bikes to mobilize all citizens of Black Rock City.

name: You Got This!
description: Feeling overwhelmed by the Playa at the moment?  We got you.  Each of the stone cold weirdos in our eclectic crew brings a unique talent that just may help you get back on track.

name: Yummy RUMInations
description: Interactive workshop oriented camp uniting burners through laughter, curiosity, and consciousness.  Absurdist games, social experiments, storytelling, workshops and home of The Yum Cart...people leave with a smile and often come back for seconds.

name: Yurtopia
description: Not necessarily the future the way it will be; the future the way it should to be...shiny!!  Home of a radio listening tea lounge and some shiny, happy people.

name: ZaZen
description: We know the playa can be overwhelming, so let us be your sanctuary. Come "Zen" out in our Om Dome or Chill in Siddhartha's Lounge. Your sure to see a friendly face around Camp ZaZen.

name: Zen as Fuck
description: Come Dance and Brush your Teeth =)

name: Zendo
description: Feeling out of sorts and looking for a place to recoup? Zendo volunteers are available 24/7 to offer psychological support to frazzled burners. Come by one of our open-air yurts by the 9 o'clock & 3 o'clock ESD/RHQ stations.

name: Zendo
description: Feeling out of sorts and looking for a place to recoup? Zendo volunteers are available 24/7 to offer psychological support and education for drug-related concerns. Come by one of our open-air yurts by the 9 o'clock & 3 o'clock ESD/RHQ stations.

name: Zerodrome
description: Zerodrome, the home of dramoetry (passionate, ranting spoken word), deep talks, and mutant vehicle technological exploration.

name: Zero Fucks
description: Zero Fucks: Leave a worry in our wishing well - take someone else's and help them process it - perhaps on our shaded dance floor?

name: Zerzura
description:
Zerzura Camp
Home of XUZA Art Car
featuring the Rootist Lounge.

name: !Zoom!
description: !Zoom! is coming home again.  Come find us during the day for workshops on fire spinning or at night to spin fire.  The dancing & partying will be happening all the time as usual.  There will be nightly fire spinning, a night of fire baseball & a night of fire dodgeball.  Or just hang in the lounge watching the fire art and spinners.  As always the playground is fun for all ages.

name: Zooniverse
description: None

name: Zooplankton
description: Zooplankton Art Support Camp will have information on the large scale art project on playa. Stop by the camp to find out more about Zooplankton, and to see a list of workshops and classes going on inside the sculpture daily.
